Ability_descripton.ABL_descr_Retribution: Activates a built-in barrier and extra weapons that deal {Dmg} per shot for {ActDuration}. Cooldown: {CD}
Ability_descripton.ABL_descr_TeslaCoil: Activates an auto cannon for {ActDuration}, which makes {Dmg} damage per second to the closest or focused enemy.
Ability_descripton.ABL_descr_RoundTable: Allies within {ActRadius} take {DmgResist} less damage. Whenever they get hit, you regenerate armor. Cooldown: {CD}
Ability_descripton.ABL_descr_Jetpack: Press to jump, hold to rise higher. Consumes fuel on use.
Ability_descripton.ABL_descr_StealthJump: Warp bubble generator enables you to hover. It also provides camouflage by bending light around your robot.
Ability_descripton.ABL_descr_OrbitalStrike: Deploys a bomb with a huge blast zone. Simple, effective, and devastating.
Ability_descripton.ABL_descr_InstantReload: Refills {AmmoPerc} of ammo after a {CastDuration} delay. Cooldown: {CD}
Ability_descripton.ABL_descr_InfiniteAmmo: After a {CastDuration} delay, grants unlimited ammo for {Duration}. Charge required: {ChargeDrain}
Ability_descripton.ABL_descr_Stealth: After a {FadeSpeed} delay, makes you invisible for {Duration}. Cooldown: {CD}
Ability_descripton.ABL_descr_FullRegeneration: Repairs all modules for {RegenSpeed}% of armor per tick. Lasts {Duration}. Charge required: {ChargeDrain}.
Ability_descripton.ABL_descr_StickySensor: Fires a device that attaches to solid surfaces. It then reveals enemies within {ActRadius} for {ActDuration} even if they are invisible. Cooldown: {CD}
Ability_descripton.ABL_descr_TensionLink: Locks onto the enemy for {ActDuration}, dealing up to {Dmg} damage per second. Damage scales with proximity. Charge required: {ChargeDrain}
Ability_descripton.ABL_descr_EchoBurst: Deals {ShieldDmg} shield damage in a straight line, revealing enemies for {ActDuration}. Cooldown: {CD}
Ability_descripton.ABL_descr_Transfusion: Mitigates {DmgResist} of incoming damage for {ActDuration}. Projectiles caught in the sphere refill your ammo. Cooldown: {CD}
Ability_descripton.ABL_descr_SpeedBoost: Speeds you up by {SpeedBoost} for {Duration}. Cooldown: {CD}. {Consum} uses.
Ability_descripton.ABL_descr_MineField: Deploys a minefield lasting {Duration}. Each mine slows enemies on impact and deals {Dmg} damage. Charge required: {ChargeDrain}
Ability_descripton.ABL_descr_Stomp: Experimental device that damages enemies, pushes them away, and slows them down. A triple threat.
Ability_descripton.ABL_descr_ActiveSpawnPoint: Deploys a minefield lasting {Duration}. Each mine slows enemies on impact and deals {Dmg} damage. Charge required: {ChargeDrain}.
Ability_descripton.ABL_descr_Harmonizer: Deploys a drone that restores {ShieldRegen} of shield energy per second to allies within {ActRadius} and causes enemies in that radius to deal 30% less damage.
Ability_descripton.ABL_descr_ActiveEnergyWall: Projects a temporary energy shield in front of you by connecting your robot's defensive and energy subroutines.
Ability_descripton.ABL_descr_SharpFeathers: Fires a barrage of missiles dead ahead, each dealing {Dmg} damage with a {ActRadius} blast radius. Cooldown: {CD}
Ability_descripton.ABL_descr_HomingPack: Fires a volley of homing missiles, each dealing {ShieldDmg} to shields and {StructDmg} to armor. Cooldown: {CD}
Ability_descripton.ABL_descr_Dazzle: Fires a homing projectile that deals {Dmg} damage and blinds target for {Duration}. Charge required: {ChargeDrain}.
Ability_descripton.ABL_descr_Homing: Fires a homing missile that deals {ArmorDmg} damage to shields or {HullDmg} to armor. Charge required: {ChargeDrain}.
Ability_descripton.ABL_descr_Blackout: Fires homing missiles that force up to 3 enemies to reload, while also slowing their reloads by {JamRelSlow} for {JamDur}. Cooldown: {CD}
Ability_descripton.ABL_descr_Teleport: Activate to mark a spot for {BeaconTime}. Activate again to warp back to that spot after a {TeleportSpeed} delay. Cooldown: {CD}
Ability_descripton.ABL_descr_Ripper: Replaces your weapon with swirling blades for {ActDuration}. They shred nearby enemies for {Dmg} damage per hit and restore your armor. Cooldown: {CD}
Ability_descripton.ABL_descr_Spotlight: Robot gains a speed boost and reveals all enemies in {ActRadius} range for {ActDuration}. Charge needed: {ChargeDrain}.
Ability_descripton.ABL_descr_Zealot: Nearby allies deal {ActEfficiency} more damage for {ActDuration}. Effect increases whenever they score kills or destroy shields. Cooldown: {CD}.
Ability_descripton.ABL_descr_InfiniteArmorShield: Creates a feedback loop in your defensive core, providing an extra shield that regenerates when not under attack.
Ability_descripton.ABL_descr_Scythe: Rush {Dist} forward, knocking aside enemies and dealing {Dmg} damage to them. Slow down targets at your destination. Cooldown: {CD}
Ability_descripton.ABL_descr_ElectronicWarfare: Prevents enemies from locking on to allies within {ActRadius} and splits all incoming damage between modules. Lasts {ActDuration}. Cooldown: {CD}
Ability_descripton.ABL_descr_AmmoGenerator: Deploys a device that boosts the reload speed of allies in range by {ActEfficiency}. Cooldown: {CD}. {Consum} uses.
Ability_descripton.ABL_descr_IncreaseDamage: Boosts offensives via network. Increases your weapon damage for you and your teammates in range.
Ability_descripton.ABL_descr_Rainfall: Bombards an area, dealing {Dmg} damage per rocket to all modules within a {ActRadius} blast radius. Cooldown: {CD}
Ability_descripton.ABL_descr_DeadLight: Marks an area for a devastating orbital strike that deals {Dmg} per tick to enemies within {ActRadius}. Cooldown: {CD}.
Ability_descripton.ABL_descr_NaniteField: Creates a wide area that speeds up allies by {ActDuration} and restores {RegenSpeed} armor per tick. Cooldown: {CD}
Ability_descripton.ABL_descr_Umbrella: Deploys a barrier with a {DomeRad} radius that protects against attacks from above. Last for {ActDuration}. Charge required: {ChargeDrain}
Ability_descripton.ABL_descr_DeployShield: Deploys a barrier with {DomeRad} radius that absorbs up to {DomeHP} damage from enemy attacks. Cooldown: {CD}
Ability_descripton.ABL_descr_ShieldDome: Deploys a barrier with {DomeRad} radius that absorbs up to {DomeHP} damage from enemy attacks. Cooldown: {CD}
Ability_descripton.ABL_desc_Blessing: Allies in front of you take {DmgResist} less damage for {ActDuration}. You cannot be destroyed while any ally is affected by this. Cooldown: {CD}
Ability_descripton.ABL_descr_Grounded: Hits an enemy within {ActRadius} and burns off {Eff} of its fuel. Cooldown: {CD}. {Consum} uses.
Ability_descripton.ABL_descr_Counterattack: Returns {Feedback} of incoming damage back at the enemy for {Duration}. Charge required: {ChargeDrain}.
Ability_descripton.ABL_descr_FuelReserve: Refills up to {FuelMax} fuel at {RegenFuel} units per tick. Cooldown: {CD}. {Consum} uses.
Ability_descripton.ABL_descr_HealingDrone: Deploys a drone that repairs allies within {ActRadius} for {ActDuration}. Cooldown: {CD}
Ability_descripton.ABL_descr_Repulsor: Deals {Dmg} damage to enemies, and pushes them and you away from each other with {Force} force. Cooldown: {CD}. {Consum} uses.
Ability_descripton.ABL_descr_Swarm: Releases drones that deal {Dmg} damage per tick to enemies within {ActRadius}, while also lowering their accuracy and rate of fire. Cooldown: {CD}
Ability_descripton.ABL_descr_Regeneration: Repairs your most damaged module for {RegenSpeed}% of armor per second. Lasts {Duration}. Cooldown: {CD}. {Consum} uses.
Ability_descripton.ABL_descr_ArmorShield: Restores {ShieldHP} shield per second for {Duration}. Cooldown: {CD}. {Consum} uses.
Ability_descripton.ABL_descr_Camouflage: Overrides your enemy's optical sensors. This makes you temporarily invisible to them.
Ability_descripton.ABL_descr_Dash: Dash in a direction you're facing. Consumes fuel on use.
Ability_descripton.ABL_descr_Unchained: Burns off {HPCostRat} of your armor to boost speed and weapon damage. Repairs you for {Vamp} of damage inflicted while active. Cooldown: {CD}
Ability_descripton.ABL_descr_Singulators: Deploys a fleet drones that intercept enemy projectiles within {ActRadius} every {SingulationRt}. Cooldown: {CD}.
Ability_descripton.ABL_descr_BlastWave: Plants a bomb within {Range}. After a short delay, explosion inflicts {Dmg} damage and knocks back enemies. Cooldown: {CD}. {Consum} uses.
Ability_descripton.ABL_descr_Snare: Deploys a magnetic trap that lasts {ActDuration} and immobilizes enemies within {ActRadius} for a short time. Cooldown: {CD}
Ability_descripton.ABL_descr_SmokeWall: Deploys a {WallSize} wide wall that blocks line of sight for {Duration}. Cooldown: {CD}. {Consum} uses.
Ability_descripton.ABL_descr_BlockingField: Deploys a {WallSize} wide barrier that stops enemies and absorbs up to {FieldHP} damage. Cooldown: {CD}. {Consum} uses.
Ability_descripton.ABL_descr_Whiplash: A homing projectile deals {Dmg} damage on hit and then {Burning} per second to all modules. Recharges if target is destroyed while active, otherwise Cooldown: {CD}
Ability_descripton.ABL_descr_Napalm: Fires a projectile that deals {RocketDmg} blast damage on impact, then {Burning} fire damage over time. Cooldown: {CD}
Ability_descripton.ABL_descr_Glacial: Fires a freezing projectile that deals {Dmg} damage to enemies within a blast radius and immobilizes them for {FreezeDur}. Cooldown: {CD}
Ability_descripton.ABL_desc_GhostTurret: Deploys a turret that attacks the closest enemy for {Dmg} damage per shot over {ActDuration}. Cooldown: {CD}. {Consum} uses.
Ability_descripton.ABL_descr_EvilEye: After a short delay, unleashes an energy beam that deals {Dmg} per second for {ActDuration}. Your robot can't walk while it's active. Cooldown {CD}.
Ability_descripton.ABL_desc_ElectricShield: Spawns a shield that lasts {ActDuration} and constantly moves forward, striking enemies touched with {Dmg} damage per second.
Ability_descripton.ABL_descr_SpawnTurret: A partially-phased turret attacks your nearest enemy. It cannot be damaged in this quantum state but has a limited lifespan.
Ability_descripton.ABL_descr_Blink: After a {BlinkSpeed} delay, teleport over {Dist} in a direction you're facing. Cooldown: {CD}. {Consum} uses.
Ability_descripton.ABL_descr_Rally: Transmits a secret code to nearby teammates, disabling their safety protocols. Temporarily provide a speed boost.
Ability_descripton.ABL_descr_Trick: Makes you invisible and projects your copy for {ActDuration}. The decoy has {ActEfficiency} more armor and shields. Cooldown: {CD}
Ability_descripton.ABL_descr_ShortCircuit: Titan strikes enemies with the chain lightning for {Dmg} Damage and disables their abilities activation for {ActDuration}.

Achievements.Ach_Gold_02_Description: Build a full Drop Team using modules of level 5 or higher.
Achievements.Ach_Bronze_10_Description: Deal 10 million damage using artillery weapons.
Achievements.Ach_Bronze_05_Description: Deal 10 million damage using automatic weapons.
Achievements.Ach_Bronze_08_Description: Deal 10 million damage using missile weapons.
Achievements.Ach_Bronze_07_Description: Deal 10 million damage using sniper weapons.
Achievements.Ach_Bronze_09_Description: Deal 10 million damage using special weapons.
Achievements.Ach_Gold_05_Description: Destroy 2 robots in a row while at least 2 of your armor segments are in critical condition.
Achievements.Ach_Silver_09_Description: Destroy 50 enemies while in the air.
Achievements.Ach_Bronze_16_Description: Destroy an enemy by damaging only one armor segment.
Achievements.Ach_Bronze_04_Description: Destroy an enemy capturing a Warp Gate.
Achievements.Ach_Silver_06_Description: Promote 5 pilots to level 3 or higher.
Achievements.Ach_Gold_04_Description: Win a battle with the enemy team being 99% to victory.

C_Currencies.HNG_Credits_Desc: In the Wild Ten, credits are the money of choice. They can be used to hire pilots and buy hardware in the store.
C_Currencies.HNG_Alloy_Desc: Cogs, nuts, bolts, and everything in between. Collect Salvage by scrapping modules. Use Salvage to build and upgrade your gear.
C_Currencies.HNG_Warpreals_Desc: WarpReals are a quantum currency used for interplanetary commerce. They can be redeemed for items from exclusive special offers.
C_Currencies.HNG_BattleTokens_Desc: Exchange Battle Tokens for the newest equipment and pilots from the Battle Pass.
C_Currencies.HNG_Intel_Desc: Trade secrets and knowledge learned on the job. Intel allows you to upgrade your equipment and improve your piloting skills faster.

Pilot_Bio.CP_Female_Mayflower_Flanker_Handy_bio_sh: "All that time I spent reading pilot comics and playing wargames with robots has paid off. Now I get to use those skills in the real world. It's awesome!"
Pilot_Bio.CP_Male_Mayflower_Flanker_Leader_bio_sho: "As a Flanker, I find the enemy's weak spots, blast their backline, and grab important objectives. That's how we did things back in the early days of Mayflower."
Pilot_Bio.CP_Male_Freecon_Brawl_Cautious_bio_short: "At least Freecon is upfront about the mission. FortEvo, on the other hand? Their communication is all — do this, do that, no questions asked. Those circuit heads are definitely up to something shady"
Pilot_Bio.CP_Female_Freecon_Brawl_Cautious_bio_sho: "Before I became a pilot, I worked as a miner on Fissure. It was brutal. I've seen friends crushed by falling rocks or get sick from Knock. And believe it or not, those were the lucky ones."
Pilot_Bio.CP_Male_Freecon_Flanker_Cautious_bio_sho: "Before I started pIloting War Robots, I used to haul Noachium to Catalyst. They always seem to need tons of the stuff. I've wondered what they use it for? Something tells me I'm better off not knowing."
Pilot_Bio.CP_Female_Tortuga_Support_Leader_bio_sho: "Before the Uprising, I was just another miner, scraping by on lousy pay. Now, with the Pilot Union on our side, things are different. Sure, we've traded mining lasers for railguns, but at least it pays well."
Pilot_Bio.CP_Male_Tortuga_Tank_Brave_bio_short: "Being a Tortuga native means different things to different people. Some folks were born here. For others, like me, it's a choice. We don't just leave the Dominions behind, we left our old lives to build something new."
Pilot_Bio.CP_Female_FortEvo_Flanker_Handy_bio_shor: "Did you know the first War Robots were adapted from mining exosuits? Someone had the bright idea to replace mining lasers with cannons, and the rest, as they say, is history."
Pilot_Bio.CP_Male_Fortevo_Tank_Cautious_bio_short: "Dominions need mercenary pilots to stake their claim on the Wild Ten. If they try to use their regular armies, it would mean starting a war no one can win. I know it. I've seen it."
Pilot_Bio.CP_Female_Freecon_Flanker_Cautious_bio_s: "Don't tell anyone I said this, okay? But I heard Freecon set bombs all over Tortuga before we took over. They can set them off whenever they want, so keep an eye out."
Pilot_Bio.CP_Female_FortEvo_Support_Madman_bio_sho: "Don't worry about the Dominions. We haven't seen the real danger yet. Something much bigger is going on, something beyond the red, green, and blue. Trust me on this. "
Pilot_Bio.CP_Female_Mayflower_Brawl_Handy_bio_shor: "Escape modules are a lifesaver. I remember when pilots were stuck in their wreck until a drop team arrived. Now, we can warp-out to and live to fight another day. "
Pilot_Bio.CP_Male_Tortuga_Support_Sneaky_bio_short: "Everyone's got a job to do in battle. Me? I'm the support guy, hanging back and picking my shots. It takes way more skill to hit your target without getting blown up than it does to just rush in with guns blazing."
Pilot_Bio.CP_Male_Tortuga_Support_Brave_bio_short: "Here on the Frontier, everyone's the same. Don't cause trouble and follow the rules, and other pilots will watch out for you. No one cares if you're some big shot back home."
Pilot_Bio.CP_Female_Tortuga_Tank_Leader_bio_short: "Here's the thing about this war. The Dominions know they'll all lose if they fight each other directly. So, they're paying us to fight for them. As long as we don't take sides, the credits keeps rolling in."
Pilot_Bio.CP_Male_Mayflower_Brawl_Handy_bio_short: "I agree with the accords that prevent AI from piloting a War Robot. I think everyone agrees that if AI could pilot War Robots, what would stop them from taking over?"
Pilot_Bio.CP_Male_Fortevo_Support_Brave_bio_short: "I came here to start over, but I need to earn some cash before I can go after my dreams. Right now, I'm making a living by keeping my crew alive out there on the battlefield. It pays the bills."
Pilot_Bio.CP_Male_Freecon_Brawl_Leader_bio_short: "I came to the Wild Ten to lend a hand, and not just in battles. I want to help build a better life for everyone here, free from Dominion control."
Pilot_Bio.CP_Male_Mayflower_Brawl_Sneaky_bio_short: "I figured I could just head home if I didn't like it here. But now that Terminus is a warzone, getting back to Mars is complicated. I was worried at first, but this place is growing on me."
Pilot_Bio.CP_Female_FortEvo_Tank_Madman_bio_short: "I haven't felt any real pain since joining FortEvo's program. But now I'm thinking, maybe they could also help with these voices in my head?"
Pilot_Bio.CP_Male_Mayflower_Tank_Madman_bio_short: "I hear the Dominions are trying to recruit spies right here on Tortuga. If you spot any, give me a shout. I haven't tossed anyone out the airlock since the uprising, and my hands are getting itchy."
Pilot_Bio.CP_Female_Freecon_Tank_Handy_bio_short: "I helped build this place when Freecon was in charge. Now the workers run things, and I've realized I like building robots more than bulkheads. I think a lot of people here feel the same way. "
Pilot_Bio.CP_Male_Mayflower_Flanker_Sneaky_bio_sho: "I love crewing up with Duncan. We're a great flanker tag team. I'm also glad he's finally ditched the helmet. It's hard to trust anyone with all these impostors around, you know? "
Pilot_Bio.CP_Male_Freecon_Tank_Cautious_bio_short: "I served under Demerost back in my Freecon days. He seems different from how I remember him, but I can't figure out what's changed."
Pilot_Bio.CP_Female_Freecon_Support_Handy_bio_shor: "I started out fixing drilling rigs in the knock mines, but Noachium isn't what you wanna stick around very long with. Then I became a pilot, now I ride around in a machine literally full of the stuff."
Pilot_Bio.CP_Male_Mayflower_Tank_Handy_bio_short: "I used to hang with The Lace's crew back on Mars. He might've been a bit shady, but that guy taught me a lot about warp tech. He also showed me how to get the most out of my robot's armor. I'm definitely grateful for that."
Pilot_Bio.CP_Female_FortEvo_Flanker_Brave_bio_shor: "I used to pilot exosuits on Earth, checking out areas messed up by the warp cataclysm. Honestly, it was a wild experience and educational about how easy it is to ruin a good thing."
Pilot_Bio.CP_Female_Tortuga_Support_Handy_bio_shor: "I was on the team that discovered APPM-3TR on some random asteroid. It's sad he can't pilot anymore, but guess what? He's a battle coordinator now! That old bot still knows how to get things done. "
Pilot_Bio.CP_Female_Tortuga_Brawl_Sneaky_bio_short: "I'm from one of the last free towns on Mars. Things were good until FortEvo showed up. They wanted everyone to get augmented, said it would make us better workers or something. I wasn't into that, so I took off and came here. "
Pilot_Bio.CP_Female_Freecon_Brawl_Madman_bio_short: "I'm totally hooked on stories about Earth's Cataclysm. Warp anomalies, radiation, earthquakes? It makes me wish I had lived back then."
Pilot_Bio.CP_Male_Fortevo_Support_Madman_bio_short: "I've always thought the Fissure's Crusher was cool. It just obliterates everything under it. Friend, foe, robot, Titan, it all gets flattened. There's something quite poetic about that, isn't there?"
Pilot_Bio.CP_Female_Freecon_Flanker_Brave_bio_shor: "I've always thought those pilots fighting in the Walking Wars were amazing. They were fearless and never gave up, even when things got rough. At least that's what I've read, so it must be true, right?"
Pilot_Bio.CP_Female_FortEvo_Flanker_Madman_bio_sho: "It's all a big conspiracy. The Dominions, Tortuga, everything. We're onto them. We see what they're doing, and they can't hide it forever. One day the whole thing will come crashing down."
Pilot_Bio.CP_Male_Tortuga_Brawl_Madman_bio_short: "Let's just say I'm not exactly known for being quiet and relaxed, okay? Truth is, I can't stand being bored. This is my ninth life, and I plan on making the most of it. "
Pilot_Bio.CP_Male_Tortuga_Flanker_Sneaky_bio_short: "Life on Mars as a contractor was a real pain. You'd build up your business, and then the Dominions would just swoop in and take it all. That's why I came to the Wild Ten. Out here, you actually have a chance to make a decent living."
Pilot_Bio.CP_Female_Mayflower_Support_Madman_bio_s: "Listen up, nobody on Tortuga is who they claim to be. Fake friends, fake stories, fake everything. It's all one big act. But the credits? That stuff's real."
Pilot_Bio.CP_Female_Mayflower_Brawl_Cautious_bio_s: "Look, I get it. More fights mean more money, right? But warping in and out of battle like that messes with your head. Seriously. People might not see it, but something weird is going on."
Pilot_Bio.CP_Male_Tortuga_Tank_Sneaky_bio_short: "Look, we pilots don't get to pick sides. We show up, do our job, and get paid. It's not about who's right or wrong, it's just a job. No hard feelings, right? "
Pilot_Bio.CP_Female_FortEvo_Flanker_Leader_bio_sho: "Lots of pilots here on Tortuga came from FortEvo. Breaking free from their control wasn't easy, but it gets easier to think for yourself after a while."
Pilot_Bio.CP_Female_FortEvo_Tank_Brave_bio_short: "Marcus Shedd's music is different. People say it takes a while to get it, but I think his songs are perfect for getting pumped up before a fight. "
Pilot_Bio.CP_Female_Mayflower_Tank_Cautious_bio_sh: "Most people on Tortuga are simply trying to live their lives. But I've also encountered my fair share of dangerous individuals here. Where there's a gold rush, criminals follow. Stay vigilant."
Pilot_Bio.CP_Female_Freecon_Brawl_Brave_bio_short: "My Freecon roots run deep. Every enemy I take down, every point I score, it just feels right. Being a good soldier is a part of who I am. "
Pilot_Bio.CP_Female_Freecon_Support_Brave_bio_shor: "My friends and I are working on an action movie, and the producers are always looking for pilots to help. Keep an eye on the job board. Who knows, you might become a star like me."
Pilot_Bio.CP_Male_Mayflower_Flanker_Handy_bio_shor: "My time with the Meritus Front taught me to be resourceful. We never threw anything away and used every little bit of salvage could get our hands on. Those skills are really coming in handy here on Tortuga."
Pilot_Bio.CP_Male_Fortevo_Tank_Leader_bio_short: "One of my ancestors worked at that Warp test site on Earth, the one they call Ground Zero now. Yeah, the place where the whole cataclsym started. It's kinda weird to think about, you know? "
Pilot_Bio.CP_Female_Tortuga_Support_Brave_bio_shor: "Say whatever you want, I find people like Kate Sinclair inspiring. You can't create something new by sticking with the old ways. We need fresh ideas and new people to keep this whole dream alive."
Pilot_Bio.CP_Male_Tortuga_Support_Leader_bio_short: "Secret of a good crew? Keep your comms clear. Having radio discipline is the foundation of your team. Especially when you don't know them well."
Pilot_Bio.CP_Female_FortEvo_Tank_Handy_bio_short: "Since I got to the Wild Ten, I've been building my own robots. I found some awesome mechanics who know how to make all the tech work together. It's totally changed my game."
Pilot_Bio.CP_Male_Tortuga_Flanker_Leader_bio_short: "Since we took over this station from Freecon, some of the old bosses are still trying to act like they're in charge. But no one's listening to them anymore! It just shows that change can be tough, but it's also funny to watch sometimes."
Pilot_Bio.CP_Male_Mayflower_Support_Brave_bio_shor: "Some grifter stole my ID. I'm going to take it back."
Pilot_Bio.CP_Male_Freecon_Tank_Madman_bio_short: "Some pilots don't like to work with me because I'm reckless, but I'm having too much fun to care."
Pilot_Bio.CP_Female_Mayflower_Support_Leader_bio_s: "Some say Ever is two hundred years old. Can you imagine having someone with that much experience on your team? But seriously, that can't be true... can it?"
Pilot_Bio.CP_Male_Fortevo_Brawl_Cautious_bio_short: "Sometimes I crew up with pilots from the Mayflower when I'm on battle contracts. Most of them don't mind my augmentations, but a few seem weirded out. They'll get used to it, though. Progress always wins out in the end."
Pilot_Bio.CP_Female_Freecon_Tank_Brave_bio_short: "The Dominions don't just dislike Tortuga because it's a free state. What bugs them is that they can't boss us around anymore. We're doing our own thing, and they hate it. "
Pilot_Bio.CP_Female_FortEvo_Support_Sneaky_bio_sho: "The Rilos Accords say AI can't pilot War Robots. But what exactly *is* AI? I've got some circuits in my head that help me think, sure. So does that mean I can't earn a living?"
Pilot_Bio.CP_Male_Freecon_Brawl_Brave_bio_short: "The Walking Wars back on Earth? Yeah, that ended quietly. But this fight for the Wild Ten? This one's gonna be loud, and messy. I'll make sure of it."
Pilot_Bio.CP_Male_Freecon_Brawl_Sneaky_bio_short: "The Wild Ten is a land of opportunity if you don't mind getting your hands dirty. The Dominions don't ask a lot of questions, and they pay well. "
Pilot_Bio.CP_Male_Tortuga_Brawl_Handy_bio_short: "The Dominions wanna come at us? That’s how I like it, straight on, toe-to-toe, and no dancing around. Tortuga needs no fake friends or weekend warriors."
Pilot_Bio.CP_Female_Freecon_Flanker_Handy_bio_shor: "The pilots who fail are the ones who can't build their own robots. Courage is one thing, but the washouts are usually just not technically-minded enough."
Pilot_Bio.CP_Male_Freecon_Support_Madman_bio_short: "The workers' uprising on Tortuga happened so fast that Freecon left containers packed with mining explosives all over the station. Do you want to try them out?"
Pilot_Bio.CP_Female_Mayflower_Support_Cautious_bio: "To be honest, I'm not crazy about these new leagues. It feels a bit like Freecon is trying to turn us against each other. But hey, if it makes pilots stronger and helps us work together, I'm in."
Pilot_Bio.CP_Female_FortEvo_Brawl_Leader_bio_short: "Tortuga can be a tough place to adjust to, especially if you're from FortEvo like me. It was a big change, but I've learned how to navigate it. If you're struggling, I'm happy to share what I've learned."
Pilot_Bio.CP_Male_Freecon_Support_Sneaky_bio_short: "Tortuga is awesome for business! No Dominion taxes draining our pay here. Most deals are done with a handshake and a promise, and that's how I like it. "
Pilot_Bio.CP_Female_Freecon_Flanker_Sneaky_bio_sho: "Tortuga's a crazy place with an open market. They've got everything there. Ancient stuff from Earth, Yan-Di tech, and even brand new War Robots straight from the factory. Just don't ask The Lace how he gets his hands on them, alright? "
Pilot_Bio.CP_Female_Tortuga_Brawl_Leader_bio_short: "Warp Gates are important for everyone on the Wild Ten. They're like railroads that connect Mars, Tortuga, and all those other planets out there. I wonder what would happen if someone just shut them all down?"
Pilot_Bio.CP_Male_Tortuga_Tank_Handy_bio_short: "What people don’t realize is how much work - spare parts, tools, supplies - it takes to keep even one Robot running. The blockade made us lean, hungry, and very adaptive."
Pilot_Bio.CP_Female_Tortuga_Flanker_Madman_bio_sho: "When I'm silent behind the enemy lines, I feel alive. They're at my mercy now. Just one push in the right direction, and they all fall like dominoes."
Pilot_Bio.CP_Female_Mayflower_Tank_Brave_bio_short: "Whenever I warp into a site, I become a fortress, a shield for the crew. I'm always out front, taking the hits, but honestly, it gives me the best view of the action."
Pilot_Bio.Hero_Pilot_Sora_Bio:
"I was born and raised Mayflower, and I always will be, but what're principles without action? Soon as I could I joined the cause and bombed plenty of those so-called "evolution" labs. I never killed anyone though, we were careful enough to make sure each was empty before we took it out. Those were the good days, the law could never catch us and I was the most famous Mayflower fighter on Qnet.

It went sour though; a couple of numbnuts in my crew got riled up behind my back about "FortEvo collaborators" and rounded some up with a view to ventilating them high-velocity AP. I got there too late to stop it and we all got caught - my crew with the bodies and the smoking guns, and the cops had been after me forever. The story of the "Mayflower murder squad" spread across the Qnet and they pinned it all on yours truly. The Man didn't want to make me a martyr, so they exiled me to the Wild Ten. 

Oh yeah, my name is Sora, but you already know that.

Kisses!"
Pilot_Bio.Hero_Pilot_Duncan_Bio: "Some call me a hustler, a thief, or even a scoundrel, but I prefer the term entrepreneur. When I first arrived, the authorities locked me up—unjustly, of course—for a slight misunderstanding with a fellow worker. As punishment, they slapped this ridiculous lie detector on me, claiming it can expose untruths. Nonsense, obviously. <LIE> Oh, shut up! Where was I? Ah, yes. After the rebellion, I was freed from confinement, but not from this blasted contraption. Now, I earn an honest living as a mercenary pilot on the Wild Ten. <LIE> Be quiet! As I said, now I earn a living as a mercenary pilot on the Wild Ten...irritating."
Pilot_Bio.Hero_Pilot_Ever_Bio:
"Who am I? I've asked that for almost two hundred years. I am a vestige of one who rode out during the Walking Wars and suffered in the silence that followed. At least, this is what they tell me. But the truth is I can't remember. Warp has taken hold of my mind. War has ravaged what’s left of my body. With every battle, a part of me is replaced. With each implant, I become more ideal for this job. One who is not burdened with a past. 

But I remember enough that the cycle is the only constant in this life. Wars always follow wars. Who I am? Only one thing. I am Forever."
Pilot_Bio.Hero_Pilot_Idy_Bio: "They say no good deed goes unpunished, and I'm living proof of this. I was maimed when I saved a man's life and for this they called me "king". I came back from war with a phantom limb for my trouble. We pilots have a code of honor - to us a job is a job and when we work we do not take sides, but you must know how the Devil comes to find you when you're down?  I had hit rock bottom, and in a shameful moment of weakness I let myself believe an illusion: my body restored, wealth, a crew. All this and more was promised to me, but I fear the choice I have made will cost me everything."
Pilot_Bio.Hero_Pilot_Kate_Bio: "Mayflower childhoods toughen you up: all the group athletics and route marches, endless classes, not forgetting the meditation to help it all sink in. I only really liked the history lessons, how we came to be here, and eventually the Walking Wars. I learned my great-grandma was a pilot, and that was it for me - where Linda Cano had gone, I would follow. Mom and Dad wanted me to go to the Academy, but I wanted more. I left them a note, and the merc crew I ran with taught me enough that I became a robot engineer. All the battle a girl could want, and we got paid too! Wild Ten wasn't what I was expecting though, it's way better. It's like being one of the transplanted species from Earth - some animals never cope with the change of environment, but little birds like the sparrows have come to thrive."
Pilot_Bio.Hero_Pilot_Leonard_Bio:
Leonard comes from a Mars colony called Novod which is claimed by Freecon. Leonard’s lineage includes a number of distinguished soldiers, and his family name appears in the annals of Freecon history on many occasions. Leonard was educated at the prestigious Active Minds Combat University, where he ranked high in his class. Afterwards, he served in Freecon’s voluntary ground combat unit, where he distinguished himself and earned several corporate military honors and merits. 

Records indicate that Leonard’s location as a Freecon operative was in deep space as part of the corporation’s anti-pirate initiative. Freecon sustained significant losses during this conflict. Leonard was discharged shortly after the Battle of Norma 330. Freecon documentation does not specify if a commissioned officer’s discharge is voluntary or involuntary.
Pilot_Bio.Hero_Pilot_Marcus_Bio: "Y'know, I grew up on Mars under a dome, and that's a small world for a wee lad. But I come up happy from blue-collar minin' stock. Mayflower to the last. That's where I found my callin', singing with the family. There was somethin' pure about joinin' our voices together. I said, when I was grown, I'd be a singin' star! but y'know, no one believed me, and they still don't. But I always believed in myself. Even after my band mates ditched me on this ...questionable outpost - I know i'm still destined for greatness! But 'fer now I'm stuck, making a livin'ere as a robot jock. Aye, it keeps me fed with a bed, but i'm gonna be a star ...jus' don't know how is all."
Pilot_Bio.Hero_Pilot_Carmen_Bio: When your dad is the CEO of Freecon you're held to certain expectations, and lets say having a sickly kid wasn't part of the old man's precious vision. I tried, I did my best in the family business, but I was never good enough for my father. I had book smarts, not the killer-capitalist mindset the future corporate crown princess I was supposed to be, so I walked out and I'm making my own life here in the Wild Ten, but I know the old man hates the idea. He should be proud: I'm a great pilot, and all his lectures on leadership and strategy sank in enough to make me a natural squad leader. I'm thriving here, this is my place and I'm not going back, period.

Pilots_Info.Pilot_TalentType_desc_General: Common skills. Some are natural, while others were learned before becoming a pilot.
Pilots_Info.Pilot_TalentType_desc_Ult: An advanced and stylish pilot skill that can only be acquired through experience and hard training.

ST_C_Classes.Class_devbot_Siren: A backline robot capable of firing on enemies from a distance and freezing them briefly. Despite weak armor and mediocre firepower, the robot provides excellent team support. It is vulnerable in close combat to flankers, so Pilots must have good battlefield awareness.
ST_C_Classes.Class_devbot_Harpy: A sniper support robot. It has a lot of fuel, allowing it to both reach places normally inaccessible to robots and quickly escape close combat. The Harpy's guns are weak against shields but effective against unshielded targets.
ST_C_Classes.Class_devbot_Tyr: A classic support robot. Its repair drone can repair even critically damaged allies. Tyr benefits from allies spotting targets for it, as its missiles require time to lock onto targets and do not work well against shielded enemies.
ST_C_Classes.Class_devbot_Fury: Good in firefights and to counter Tacticians. Its weapons allow it to take down enemy shields at long range quickly, but its low capacity for armor damage means it should avoid close combat.
ST_C_Classes.Class_Assault_descr: Assaults are designed for frontal attacks and mid-range firefights.  They carry powerful weapons and can hold out in open confrontations for long periods. Their shields start regenerating faster than other classes, and their armor is strong enough to take a lot of damage.
ST_C_Classes.Class_devbot_Ravana: With its ability to protect itself and its allies during an attack, this robot makes a great team bodyguard. Its weaponry could be better suited for direct combat, but its broad area of effect allows it to cover large areas from a distance. This can slow down enemy advances and give enemy tacticians an unpleasant surprise.
ST_C_Classes.Class_Defender_descr: Defenders are designed to hold team positions. They are structurally strong, but their shields are weak. However, their shields regenerate almost instantly. A Defender's abilities boost its survivability and that of nearby allies.
ST_C_Classes.Class_devbot_Typhon: Designed for skirmishes with distant enemy forces. Its built-in ability allows it to temporarily disable the weapons of multiple opponents, and its weapon can hit several targets at once. Typhon is poorly protected, so it should fight at a distance from behind cover.
ST_C_Classes.Class_devbot_Fenrir: Fenrir's best bet is to rush into a fight, trade armor, withdraw, and regenerate. This requires a skillful combination of abilities and tactical maneuvering. It fights best at close range but works at medium range, too.
ST_C_Classes.Class_Flanker_descr: Flankers are fast robots that work best as scouts or assassins. Their speed allows them to move quickly across the map, capture unguarded Warp Gates, or conduct hit-and-run attacks from the sidelines.
ST_C_Classes.Class_devbot_Phantom: The use of this short-ranged flanker is based on its built-in abilities. This robot will not survive a stand-up fight. Still, a good pilot can rush into enemy lines, wreak havoc, fire off ammunition, and then teleport to safety to restore its shields before the enemy can properly react.
ST_C_Classes.Class_devbot_Griffin: It does not have the best armor for a defender, but its abilities make it ideal for counteracting enemy tacticians. Griffin is a team player but can hold their own in one-on-one fights with lightly armored opponents who get too close.
ST_C_Classes.Class_devbot_Loki: Loki's ability to use holographic projections makes it an excellent infiltrator and scout. Its armor is strong for its class, and its anti-shield firepower means it can easily take on flankers, though it should avoid encounters with heavier robots.
ST_C_Classes.Class_devbot_Purifier: This is a super-heavy assault robot. Its clumsiness makes it vulnerable to long-range opponents, but this is balanced by its powerful armor. It is ideal for team assaults in confined spaces.
ST_C_Classes.Class_Mixed_descr: Mixed Class robots are assembled from modules of different classes. They combine all the advantages and disadvantages of their components. For a robot to get a certain class, all of its modules must belong to that same class.
ST_C_Classes.Class_Tactician_descr: Tacticians are backline robots that are designed to weaken enemies and support allies with ranged fire, thus helping to control the battlefield. Their components are lighter than other classes, while their high speed and large fuel capacity allow them to occupy positions inaccessible to other robots.
ST_C_Classes.Class_devbot_Raven: This robot boasts an excellent combination of speed and armor. Equipped with a beam weapon that requires precise aim, Raven may only deal little damage, but a skilled pilot can target the enemy's weak spots from a distance.
ST_C_Classes.Class_devbot_Varangian: This robot is ideal for initiating combat and weakening enemy robots with area-of-effect damage. Due to the low speed of its missiles, it will struggle to hit fast enemies. It can seriously damage Defenders and Assaults, and its signature ability will allow it to survive retaliatory fire.
ST_C_Classes.Class_devbot_Scorpion: The Scorpion is an assassin. The pilot must wait until the enemies are weak enough to be picked off individually. The robot's weapons are ideal for critical damage up close and heavy fire at long range.
ST_C_Classes.Class_devbot_Lancelot: This defender is perfect for pilots who value durability. It is as big and cumbersome as it is tough, and it can regenerate when its allies take damage. Its poor mobility and low shield damage won't let it deal with enemy flankers, but large enemies will suffer under a hail of shells.
ST_C_Classes.Class_devbot_Bulwark: This machine is easy to handle and does not rely on friendlies being nearby. It can evade enemy fire, and its weapon does not require reloading. This robot is strong in prolonged close-quarters battles but is vulnerable against long-range, rapid-fire foes.
ST_C_Classes.Class_devbot_Ares: This flanker is designed for rapid, aggressive attacks against single targets. Despite its lightweight construction, it can inflict tremendous damage up close while protected by its shield. Abilities help Ares safely retreat when it becomes vulnerable due to long weapon reloads.
ST_C_Classes.Class_devbot_Orochi: Use this lightweight robot to scout for enemies and spot artillery fire. It's fast and carries long-range lasers but is vulnerable in close combat. Its best tactic is constant movement and targeted strikes at the enemy's flanks.
ST_C_Classes.Class_devbot_Bulgasari: A versatile robot for medium and close-range combat. Built-in abilities allow you to flush tacticians into the open. Because of its high mobility, it can effectively counter flankers, but due to its lack of firepower, it is better to avoid direct combat with heavier robots.

ST_CombatHUD.HUD_DescTeamDeathMatch: Destroying an enemy robot scores 1 point for your team. The first team to score {goal} points wins. Your supply of robots is unlimited.
ST_CombatHUD.HUD_JoinAnotherSquad: Do you want to join another crew?
ST_CombatHUD.HUD_RobotsList_SpawnLimitation: Each robot can warp in only once
ST_CombatHUD.HUD_DescEliminationPart1: The first team to destroy all opposing robots wins the battle.
ST_CombatHUD.HUD_DescElimination: The first team to destroy all opposing robots wins the battle. If the time runs out, the team with the most remaining robots wins.
ST_CombatHUD.HUD_Popup_ContinuePrompt: Hold {0}|switch(,) to Continue
ST_CombatHUD.HUD_DescEliminationPart2: If the time runs out, the team with the most robots remaining wins.
ST_CombatHUD.HUD_MainMenu_ConfirmLeaveMatch: You are ending this battle contract. Are you sure?
ST_CombatHUD.HUD_DescEliminationPart3: Captured warp gates act as deployment zones.
ST_CombatHUD.HUD_HelpScreenComplexHint: Hold {input}|switch("{HelpScreen}","{IA_HelpScreen}") to view the robot's characteristics
ST_CombatHUD.HUD_DescBeaconRushPart2: The team that captures and holds the most gates receives points, while the team with fewer does not.
ST_CombatHUD.HUD_DescBeaconRushPart1: Several strategically placed Warp Gates are located throughout the site. Your job is to capture and hold them.
ST_CombatHUD.HUD_DescBeaconRush: There are several Warp Gates on the map. Your task is to take and hold them. The team that holds the most earns points. To win, either reach the points target first or eliminate the opposition.
ST_CombatHUD.HUD_DescBeaconRushPart3: To win, score enough points before your opposition does, or eliminate the enemy team.
ST_CombatHUD.HUD_DescSpearhead:
Capture and defend Warp Probes to earn points.
When a Warp Probe is depleted, a new one will appear on a marked spot. 
Continue holding Warp Probes until your team reaches score limit.
ST_CombatHUD.HUD_MainMenu_ConfirmAbandonRobot: Your robot will be destroyed. Proceed?

ST_Module_Description.MDL_Category_Pilot_Desc: Choose a pilot to operate your robot
ST_Module_Description.MDL_Skel_CycleGear_Desc: Select your Cycle Gear. These are combat tools built to disrupt your enemies, or boost your allies. All Cycle Gear types need to accumulate enough energy in battle before they can be activated
ST_Module_Description.MDL_Skel_SupplyGear_Desc: Select your Supply Gear. These are consumables that provide you with extra combat utility via a limited number of uses per deployment, equal to its Supply Limit.
ST_Module_Description.MDL_Skel_Chassis_Desc: Install a Chassis module here: it defines the robot's mobility, weight capacity and energy supply which is used to power other modules.
ST_Module_Description.MDL_Skel_Shoulder_Desc: Install a Shoulder module here. Shoulders provide extra weapon slots and carry shield generators for the regenerating shields that protect you from enemy fire.
ST_Module_Description.MDL_Skel_Torso_Desc: Install a Torso module here. Each Torso comes with a signature core gear module that provides you with powerful combat tricks. Some of these modules also have weapon slots
ST_Module_Description.MDL_Skel_Weapon_Desc: Install a weapon here. Heavy weapons can only be mounted in universal slots. Light weapons can go into any slot.
ST_Module_Description.MDL_Skel_Ability_Desc: Select your gear. It will give you tactical advantages in battle at the cost of some energy supplied by your Chassis.

ST_OfferDescriptions.Titan_Tactician_Description: A superior Robot to secure victory

ST_Pilot_Class.Pilot_Class_desc_Flanker: Relying on burst weapons and mobility, these pilots employ hit-and-run tactics that keep the enemy on edge.
ST_Pilot_Class.Pilot_Class_desc_Brawler: The perfect balance of armor and mobility. Does a lot of damage, using simple and straightforward tactics.
ST_Pilot_Class.Pilot_Class_desc_RSupport: Reliable for repairs and support. These pilots prefer long-range engagements and assisting others.
ST_Pilot_Class.Pilot_Class_desc_Tank: Strong and well-armored. These mercenaries might be a bit slower, but they are the pilots you want fighting at your side.

ST_Pilot_Personality.Pilot_Pers_desc_Handy: This pilot combines brains and brawn, making calculated decisions to maximize combat efficiency.
ST_Pilot_Personality.Pilot_Pers_desc_Brave: Fearlessly charges into battle without a second thought. Always ready for a close combat fight.
ST_Pilot_Personality.Pilot_Pers_desc_Cautious: These pilots are cautious and steady, preferring to attack from the safety of their team's territory.
ST_Pilot_Personality.Pilot_Faction_desc_FortEvo: Believes that human survival depends on adaptation. Relies heavily on mechanical and biological engineering.
ST_Pilot_Personality.Pilot_Pers_desc_Madman: Loves fire, explosions, and dealing damage. Takes on high risks for high rewards.
ST_Pilot_Personality.Pilot_Pers_desc_Sneaky: Master of stealth. This trait enhances a pilot's aptitude for ambushes, assassinations, and infiltration.
ST_Pilot_Personality.Pilot_Faction_desc_Freecon: Expansionists who strike a balance between a human's inherent potential and the advantages of augmentation.
ST_Pilot_Personality.Pilot_Faction_desc_Tortuga: A community of rebels outside of Dominion control. Home to mercenary pilots who are equal parts allies and enemies.
ST_Pilot_Personality.Pilot_Faction_desc_Mayflower: Human traditionalists with extraordinary mastery of their bodies and minds through disciplined training.
ST_Pilot_Personality.Pilot_Pers_desc_Leader: Believes winning is a team sport. Enhances combat through team tactics and individual valor.

ST_Quests.Daily_Freecon_DealHullDamageBlastGuns_De:
Running out of ammo in a fight? Yeah, not ideal. A few of us pilots have been crafting shells from whatever we can scrounge up. We’re still tweaking the formula and could use some help testing them. Think you’re up for it? Don’t worry—we’re pretty sure they’re safe.

– "Drillbit" Ortiz, Pilot
ST_Quests.Daily_Mayflower_KillAssistAresFury_Descr:
The Department of Peace wants me to build a hybrid flanker/assault robot.  I keep telling them that mixing roles complicates things, but no one listens. Can you take Ares or Fury for a test run and let me know what you think? I’m running out of time and really need your feedback.

– Anonymous
ST_Quests.Daily_FortEvo_CaptureBeaconsOrochiHarpy_:
A few of us Pilots are waiting for battle contracts at the Union Hall. We’ve made some bets on which tactical robot is better at capturing Warp Gates: Orochi or Harpy. Maybe we’ll let the pilots working today figure it out.

- Unemployed
ST_Quests.Tutorial_Level11_RobotBuilds_Lancelot_Go: Take {Limit} damage on a robot with a Lancelot torso module installed
ST_Quests.Daily_FortEvo_CaptureBeaconsTitan_Descri:
Alright, I get it—nobody wants to talk to me about Titans. Fine. But can we at least talk about a Titan point system?  I just can’t wrap my head around this. Maybe you can help me figure it out by capturing a few gates with one of these machines? I’m desperate here. My report is due and I got nothing!

– "Duke" Blanko, Mars News Network
ST_Quests.Quest_Description_Weekly25:
[SPONSORED] At Mayflower, we create advanced robotic systems that enhance a pilot, not replace them.  If you believe that robots are better with pilots, not the other way around, fight with Mayflower modules today and take control of the battlefield.

– Department of Peace, Mayflower
ST_Quests.Quest_Description_Faction1:
[SPONSORED] One year ago, radical workers took control of our spaceport and declared it a "Tortuga". Despite this, Freecon remains committed to peacefully resolving the issue and reclaiming our property. This week, the Grand Marshal announced a new plan to reinforce Freecon's presence in the Wild Ten. We remain hopeful that justice and order will soon be restored.

– Freecon, Ministry of Defense
ST_Quests.Daily_Mayflower_KillAssistNTimes_Goal: Assist or destroy {Criteria} robots in battle {Limit} times
ST_Quests.Daily_Mayflower_DestroyRobotsNTimes_Desc:
At Mayflower, we believe in the thrill of competition and the spirit of human resilience. It’s not just about winning—it’s about celebrating our humanity.Today, we’re offering a challange to all pilots. It doesn’t matter who you fight or why. Because it's how we fight that makes us all human.

– Department of Peace, Mayflower
ST_Quests.Daily_Freecon_WinBattlesLokiRaven_Descri:
While everyone's worried about the Terminus mess, I see dollar signs. Blast ammo's gettin' scarce? Let's make it even scarcer.  Here's the job. Use up as much blast ammo as you can get your hands on. Drive up the price, and I'll give you a piece of my profits.

– "Dax", Morgan Family Associate
ST_Quests.Tutorial_Level4_Workshop_BuildARobotGoal: Add {Limit} more Robot to your hangar by building it in the Workshop
ST_Quests.Quest_Goal_Weekly11: Capture {Limit} Warp Gates using Duncan or Kate as pilots.

ST_Quests.Tutorial_Level7_RobotRoles_Flanker2_Goal: Capture {Limit} Warp Gates using Phantom Torso
ST_Quests.Daily_FortEvo_CaptureBeaconsFortEvoRobot: Capture {Limit} Warp Gates using FortEvo robot torso
ST_Quests.Daily_FortEvo_CaptureBeaconsSirenTyphon_: Capture {Limit} Warp Gates using Siren or Typhon Torso
ST_Quests.Daily_FortEvo_CaptureBeaconsOrochiHarpy_: Capture {Limit} Warp Gates using a Orochi or Harpy

ST_Quests.Quest_Goal_Faction1: Complete {Limit} daily jobs assigned by Freecon
ST_Quests.Quest_Goal_Faction3: Complete {Limit} daily jobs assigned by Mayflower
ST_Quests.Quest_Description_Weekly18:
The Dominion of Freecon isn't just about expanding into new frontiers, we're also committed to supporting your mercenary lifestyle. We're seeking patriotic pilots to demonstrate their expertise in battle. By making an impact, you'll inspire countless others who see the Frontier as a new beginning.

– Freecon, Ministry of Information
ST_Quests.Quest_Description_Weekly23:
[SPONSORED] We won’t tell you how to build your robot, but there’s a reason top pilots choose Freecon. Our modules deliver the performance you need to dominate the Wild Ten. This week, earn exclusive rewards and bonuses when you win battles using Freecon gear.

– Freecon, Ministry of Defense

ST_Quests.Quest_Description_Weekly14:
Unauthorized attempts to control Warp Gates have been detected—a troubling sign of a potential security breach. If our warp cipher is compromised, the consequences could ripple far beyond the Jump network. FortEvo urgently needs pilots to secure Warp Gates using our equipment and uncover the source of these vulnerabilities. Act swiftly. Our future depends on it.

– Proxima, FortEvo Sector General
ST_Quests.Daily_FortEvo_ObtainHonorNTimes_Goal: Earn {Criteria} Impact points in a battle {Limit} times
ST_Quests.Daily_FortEvo_ObtainHonorFortEvoRobots_G: Earn {Limit} Impact points using FortEvo torso
ST_Quests.Daily_FortEvo_ObtainHonorFortEvoGuns_Goa: Earn {Limit} Impact points using FortEvo weapons
ST_Quests.Quest_Description_Weekly9:
FortEvo believes new worlds need a new human. A better human. This week, dominate the battlefield and earn bonus pay while showing the other dominions that they can't stop progress. Fight with FortEvo weapons and change yourself, not the world.

– Overseer After, FortEvo
ST_Quests.Quest_Description_Weekly24:
[SPONSORED] Are you struggling to survive in the harsh worlds of the Wild Ten? Don't expect things to get easier on their own. But there's hope. By using FortEvo modules in battle, you're not just making a choice. You're investing in a new kind of human - one equipped to survive these unforgiving worlds.

– FortEvo, Conclave of Progress
ST_Quests.Quest_Description_Faction2:
Join FortEvo’s Wild Ten Support Program this week and earn rewards for your contributions. Complete missions that push our cause forward and shape your future. This isn’t just another program—it’s your chance to be part of something bigger. Support a new human for a new world.

– FortEvo, Conclave of Progress
ST_Quests.Daily_Freecon_DealDamageTyrFenrir_Descri:
Freecon is offering tactical and assault training on Tyr and Fenrir torsos. You're already volunteered for this through the Pilots Union. All pilots who complete the training qualify for bonus pay. Good hunting.

– Ava, Pilots Union Steward
ST_Quests.Quest_Description_Weekly8:
This war isn’t about who conquers the Wild Ten or whether they’re transhuman. It’s about our future in space. Our brotherhood supports Freecon, who sees the Wild Ten as just the beginning. By fighting with Freecon weapons, we send a message to all worlds: we’re fighting for our destiny among the stars.

– Meritus Front
ST_Quests.Quest_Description_Weekly3:
Freecon is searching for a talented pilot to be featured in our new public service campaign. This is your chance to showcase our top-of-the-line weaponry, and your skills, in The Wild Ten! Be an inspiration for future generations of pilots and win prize money. Are you ready to be famous?



– Freecon, Ministry of Information
ST_Quests.Daily_Freecon_DealHullDamagePursuerRaven:
Hey Pilots, our training program is getting quite popular, so the Pilots Union decided to expand it. Today, we're offering Flanker training using Pursuer, and assault strategies with Raven. Freecon has offered all Pilots who participate a bonus. What do you have to lose? 

– Ava, Pilots Union Steward
ST_Quests.Daily_Freecon_DealDamageGozerNoricum_Des:
Hi pilots, I am the Gozer and Noricum weapon systems designer. I've been asked to improve them, but I'm not a pilot and need guidance about what to fix. So why not ask the experts? Take these weapons into battle, and I'll buy your combat data.

"Blink" Wilson, Weapons Designer
ST_Quests.Quest_Title_Weekly11: Hold It Down Duncan (recruitment - I have a problem)
ST_Quests.Daily_FortEvo_CaptureBeaconsSirenTyphon_:
I have a collection of classic Siren and Typhon parts for sale. Buyers on Tortuga are interested, but they need proof these models are still reliable in combat. We’re looking for pilots to capture a few Warp Gates with these torsos to show they’re still effective. Complete the job, and I'll send some credits your way.

– Ignite, New Dawn Recycling
ST_Quests.Daily_FortEvo_ObtainHonorNTimes_Descript:
I hope this message finds you. A few months ago, I had trouble with some pilots at the Union Hall. I believe you appeared out of nowhere and saved me. You were augmented, so I figured you were FortEvo, at least before coming to Tortuga. I never had a chance to thank you. If you're still around, I know you are also still making a difference. This is my way of honoring you.

– Anonymous
ST_Quests.Daily_Mayflower_DestroyRobots_Descriptio:
I know life isn't easy for anyone, but many Mayflower workers on the frontier don't have enough salvage to make it through the next solar cycle. Maybe you could you sell me some scrapped enemies once you're done with them? I'll make sure it goes to a good cause.

– Autumn Glowacki, Contract worker
ST_Quests.Daily_Mayflower_KillAssistMayflowerGuns_:
I take the jobs I’m assigned, but working for Freecon or FortEvo just doesn’t sit right. I know I’m not alone in this. While we can’t control how the Pilots’ Union assigns contracts, we can choose where our credits go. Fight with Mayflower gear and support the right side. I’m backing my words with my credits—will you?

– Anonymous
ST_Quests.Daily_FortEvo_CaptureBeaconsBulwark_Desc:
I'm a mechanic who's been working on Bulwark models for a while. Now, I know these machines are solid for defense, but I also know they have what it takes to be frontline Robots. Capture some jump points with this machine and show everyone the versatility of FortEvo engineering.

– Soar, FortEvo Mechanic
ST_Quests.Daily_Freecon_DealDamageTitan_Descriptio:
I'm a reporter from the Mars News Network. I'm looking into these strange robots called Titans. Why can't pilots deploy them at the start of a match? What are Titan points? Let me study your Titan in action, and I'll pay you.

– "Duke" Blanko, Mars News Network
ST_Quests.Daily_Mayflower_DestroyRobotsMayflowerRo:
I'm not a pilot, but I do know we're fighting for more than a few sites scattered around the Wild Ten. You must stand strong against Dominions who want to change us. I stand with Mayflower and their commitment to guarding our human identity here and on Mars. Fight with Mayflower robots and stand against FortEvo's evolution program.

– Anonymous
ST_Quests.Daily_Mayflower_DestroyRobotsTitan_Descr:
I'm shooting a movie about the Wild Ten and need help getting the final shot. The scene is about a powerful Titan who needs to destroy an enemy robot in a decisive move. Sounds good, right? I'll need a few takes to get the perfect shot. Do you have what it takes? Professionals only.

– Dylan Mork, Talent Scout
ST_Quests.Daily_Freecon_DealDamagePhantomRavana_De:
I'm weighing my options for the next robot purchase, but can't decide between Phantom or Ravana. Both have their strengths, but I can only afford one right now. Could you help me make a decision? I don't have much to offer, but I can't afford to make a mistake.

– "Star" Ashton, Pilot
ST_Quests.Quest_Description_Weekly13:
We all know the effects of prolonged warp exposure on humans, but what about robots? I’m a leading Warp Science researcher, and I need your help to find out. I’m looking for pilots to capture Warp Gates using the Freecon module and share the data with me.

– Dr. "Angel" Nolan, Freecon Medical
ST_Quests.Quest_Description_Weekly20:
Remember the Walking Wars, when battles were fought for honor? At Mayflower, we hold those traditions dear. This week, we invite you to relive that spirit with Mayflower modules. Make an impact, earn rewards, and show the world what Mayflower stands for.

– Department of Peace, Mayflower
ST_Quests.Daily_Mayflower_KillAssistIncineratorTwi:
I’m creating a movie about the Wild Ten and need footage for a pivotal, action-packed scene. I see fire, rockets, and unforgettable spectacle. Pilots, this is your chance to shine. Show me your skills, and I’ll make sure your name lives on—this isn’t just about credits, it’s about fame. Ready to take the stage?

– Vlada Strong, Movie Director
ST_Quests.Daily_Mayflower_KillAssistPunisherThunde:
I’m here at the Union Hall with fresh recruits from a Mayflower colony. They’re asking what's better for their first build, a heavy shotgun or a light auto cannon? I thought I’d put it out there and get input from you pros. Drop your thoughts, and I’ll drop some credits. Gotta look out for the young bloods.

– Ava, Pilots Union Steward
ST_Quests.Daily_FortEvo_DeployTitan_Description:
I’m investigating Titans, but no one seems willing to discuss how these machines are used in battle. But maybe we can talk about who is using them? As far as I can tell these things don't have a pilot. So who exactly is piloting a Titans during combat? It’s unclear, but maybe you can help me uncover the truth.

– "Duke" Blanko, Mars News Network
ST_Quests.Daily_Mayflower_KillAssistOrkanZeus_Desc:
I’m new to Tortuga and still finding my footing. While I know robots inside and out, combat is a whole new challenge. Coming from Mayflower, I’m familiar with Orkan and Zeus on a technical level, but which one will actually bring me more wins? Share your advice, and I'll share some credits.

– Kate Sinclair, Pilot
ST_Quests.Daily_Mayflower_DestroyRobotsPunisherThu:
I’m not here to tell you who to fight for—I know how you pilots feel about that. But let’s say some folks would be very pleased if ammo stocks for Punisher and Thunder were thinned out today. Staying neutral doesn’t mean being a sucker. Details below.

– Jacob Thrust, Morgan Family Associate
ST_Quests.Daily_Freecon_WinBattlesTop3Honor_Descri:
[SPONSORED] Do you have what it takes to follow in the footsteps of legendary pilots like Kyle Rogers and Linda Cano? The Ministry of Information is seeking ace pilots for our Hero pilot program. Fight for more than credits. Fight to be a legend.

– Freecon, Ministry of Defense

ST_Quests.Quest_Goal_Weekly9: Destroy {Limit} robots using FortEvo torso or weapon
