ST_Quests.Tutorial_Level6_RobotRoles_Flanker1_Goal: Destroy {Limit} Robots using Phantom torso while no enemies are within 200m
ST_Quests.Daily_Mayflower_DestroyRobotsIncinerator: Destroy {Limit} robots using Incinerator or Gemini
ST_Quests.Daily_Mayflower_DestroyRobotsOrkanZeus_G: Destroy {Limit} robots using Orkan or Zeus
ST_Quests.Daily_Mayflower_DestroyRobotsPunisherThu: Destroy {Limit} robots using Punisher or Thunder
ST_Quests.Daily_Mayflower_DestroyRobotsTrebuchetSh: Destroy {Limit} robots using Trebuchet or Shredder
ST_Quests.Daily_Mayflower_KillAssistNTimes_Descrip:
Knowing we all have a role to play is the key to victory in the Wild Ten—it’s the heart and soul of being Mayflower. Teamwork isn’t just about everyone knowing their job; it’s about everyone sharing the same goal. Let’s fight together for a stronger, more Human future.

– Elara Voss, CEO of Mayflower
ST_Quests.Quest_Title_Weekly12: Ever In Control (Personal - I am looking for)
ST_Quests.Daily_Mayflower_KillAssistAresFury_Goal: Make {Limit} assists or kills using Ares or Fury torso
ST_Quests.Daily_Mayflower_KillAssistMayflowerRobot: Make {Limit} assists or kills using Mayflower robot torso
ST_Quests.Daily_Mayflower_KillAssistOrkanZeus_Goal: Make {Limit} assists or kills using Orkan or Zeus weapons
ST_Quests.Daily_Mayflower_KillAssistTrebuchetShred: Make {Limit} assists or kills using Trebuchet or Shredder weapons
ST_Quests.Daily_Mayflower_KillAssistMayflowerGuns_: Make {Limit} assists or kills using any Mayflower weapon
ST_Quests.Daily_Mayflower_KillAssistTitan_Goal: Make {Limit} assists or kills using any Titan
ST_Quests.Daily_Mayflower_KillAssistIncineratorTwi: Make {Limit} assists or kills usng Incinerator or Gemini weapons
ST_Quests.Daily_Mayflower_KillAssistGriffinBulgasa: Make {Limit} assists or kills with Griffin or Bulgasari torso
ST_Quests.Daily_Mayflower_KillAssistLancelotPurifi: Make {Limit} assists or kills with a Lancelot or Purifier torso
ST_Quests.Daily_Mayflower_KillAssistPunisherThunde: Make {Limit} assists or kills with the Punisher or Thunder weapon
ST_Quests.Daily_FortEvo_CaptureBeacons_Description:
Many of you have reported health issues after traveling through Warp Gates. FortEvo is eager to understand this phenomenon and needs your help. To participate, capture Warp Gates while equipped with our special transponder. Your contributions will aid in uncovering the cause.

– Blight, FortEvo Bioengineering
ST_Quests.Daily_Freecon_DealHullDamageEnergyGuns_D:
Many pilots have been asking me about power cells. While the troubles on Terminus make them harder to find, don’t worry—The Lace has your back. I’ve been working on a Noachium-based prototype, and the results are promising. Perhaps you could test them out for me? Remember, I always pay my debts.

– "The Lace", Master mechanic
ST_Quests.Daily_Mayflower_DestroyRobotsLancelotPur:
Many see the fighting around the Terminus Port as a problem, but I see an opportunity. I can't say much, but I’ve got a plan to make some credits using Lancelot, Purifier, and a healthy dose of destruction. Here’s the deal: I need pilots willing to join me, and in return, I’ll split the profits. What do you say?

– Anonymous
ST_Quests.Daily_Freecon_WinBattlesFreeconRobots_De:
We know the troubles on Terminus are stretching our ammo stocks thin, but contracts must be completed. The Pilots Union is asking all mercenaries to switch to more sustainable energy weapons to help. Do your part and stay safe out there.

– Ava, Pilots Union Steward
ST_Quests.Quest_Description_Weekly15:
I've got a deal for you. I made a bet that Mayflower gear is the best and I need your help proving it. The challenge? Capture Warp Gates using Mayflower equipment. The reward? A share of my winnings for every gate you take. Help me reach my goal, and I'll cut you in.

– Anonymous
ST_Quests.Quest_Description_Weekly10:
I work with FortEvo folks on Fissure, and they’re always bragging about their fancy enhancements. But they’ve forgotten what truly makes us powerful.I support Mayflower because they believe we can be strong without losing who we are. If you can prove that Mayflower tech is just as good as any other, this proud human will reward you.

– Miner, Fissure site
ST_Quests.Quest_Description_Faction3:
[SPONSORED] Concerned about FortEvo’s push to alter humanity or Freecon’s imperial ambitions? So are we. That’s why Mayflower is launching the Human World support program. This week, complete jobs sponsored by Mayflower and help us preserve our humanity. Be on the right side of history. 

– Department of Peace, Mayflower
ST_Quests.Tutorial_Level4_RobotRoles_Defender1_Goa:
Absorb {Limit} damage using Absorber Sphere
Gear
ST_Quests.Quest_Description_Weekly4:
Ready to boost your earnings? FortEvo [REDACTED] is seeking skilled pilots for a confidential job. Install our advanced [REDACTED] on your robot and dominate the battlefield. We’ll handle the rest. Your discretion is guaranteed. This opportunity is for a select few who understand the value of [REDACTED].

– Anonymous
ST_Quests.Quest_Goal_Weekly16: Earn {Limit} Impact points using Duncan or Kate as pilots.
ST_Quests.Quest_Goal_Weekly19: Earn {Limit} Impact points using FortEvo torso or weapon
ST_Quests.Quest_Goal_Weekly18: Earn {Limit} Impact points using Freecon torso or weapon
ST_Quests.Quest_Goal_Weekly17: Earn {Limit} Impact points using Ever or Marcus
ST_Quests.Quest_Goal_Weekly20: Earn {Limit} Impact points using Mayflower torso or weapon
ST_Quests.Daily_Mayflower_KillAssistGriffinBulgasa:
Our Mayflower weapons labs have begun development the next generation of Iron Rain and Pulse core gear. We’re looking for Pilots to help identify what’s most critical to improve. Take Bulgasari and Griffin out today and let us know what needs fixing—we’re listening.

– Darius Trent, Head of Field Development
ST_Quests.Quest_Description_Weekly6: Yan-Di agents Make an offer to Duncan and Kate.
ST_Quests.Quest_Description_Weekly17: Pilots don't get the respect they deserve. But they do get paid occasionally. Focus on your career. You can buy respect when the time comes.
ST_Quests.Daily_Freecon_DealHullDamageRampantScour:
Pilots take for granted how easily parts can switch between robots, but for us mechanics, it's a constant challenge. I could use your help testing the weapon mounts for Rampant and Scourge special weapons systems. Fight with them, and let me know if you spot any trouble.

– "The Lace", Master Mechanic
ST_Quests.Daily_Freecon_DealHullDamageNTimes_Descr:
Pilots, I'm working on a new exciting [REDACTED] project and need help. I can't say much about it, but armor damage interests me. If you're looking for some side work, follow the attached instructions and get back to me when you're done. 

– "Master" Davies, Gear Engineer
ST_Quests.Tutorial_Level7_RobotRoles_Chimera1_Goal: Play {Limit} battles on a robot using Griffin torso
ST_Quests.Tutorial_Level6_Titan_Unlock_Goal: Reach level 7 to unlock a Titan
ST_Quests.Daily_FortEvo_CaptureBeaconsNTimes_Descr:
Reports of malware in the Warp Gate system have surfaced. While we trust our rivals to honor transport agreements within the Wild Ten, FortEvo remains committed to ensuring the system's integrity. With the Pilots' Union's consent, we ask pilots to equip their robots with our scanning device and secure any Warp Gates they encounter. If the rumors prove true, rest assured we will take decisive action.

– Perpetual, FortEvo Consular
ST_Quests.Quest_Description_Weekly21: Robot pilots deserve more respect. But until that day, money will have to do instead.
ST_Quests.Quest_Description_Weekly19:
At FortEvo, we’re advancing human evolution through the fusion of mutation and robotics. Our cutting-edge technology delivers real-world results. This week, equip yourself with our gear, earn impact points, and gain a combat advantage—along with a bonus. Join us and be part of the revolution in human evolution.

– Perpetual, FortEvo Consular
ST_Quests.Quest_Description_Weekly16: Some people say pilots are born, not made. But I think you can make anyone a pilot. They just won’t live for very long.
ST_Quests.Quest_Description_Weekly1: XX is seeking skilled pilots to collect weapon data during combat. Because of the sensitive nature of the collection gear, only candidates with a mechanical background are being considered.
ST_Quests.Quest_Description_Weekly12: Some robot pilots are destined for great things. It’s just as inevitable that others end up as red stains in burnt out robot husks at the scrapyard.
ST_Quests.Daily_Mayflower_KillAssistTitan_Descript:
Strong mercenaries mean a strong Pilots Union, so we're here to level you up. Join our Titan Kill Assist Training Module to sharpen your skills, gain valuable experience, and earn some bonus pay. Ready to rise to the challenge?

– Ava, Pilots Union Steward
ST_Quests.Daily_Freecon_WinBattles_Description:
With Terminus becoming a hot site, supply lines are getting tight. But the fight doesn't stop. We need ammunition, and I'm making it right here on Tortuga. I'm looking for pilots to test my locally made ammo. Prove its effectiveness in the field, and I'll make it worthwhile.

– Anonymous
ST_Quests.Daily_Freecon_DealDamageRampantScourge_D:
The Freecon Office of Technical Inspectors seeks skilled Pilots to field-test two weapon platforms: Scourge, a battle-hardened weapon upgraded for the first time in two centuries, and Rampant, a cutting-edge development fresh from the lab. Pilots who participate will earn extra rewards.

– "Spades" Hughes, FOTI Officer
ST_Quests.Daily_Mayflower_DestroyRobotsGriffinBulg:
The Morgans need you to do them a favor. And if you know the Morgans, they aren't asking. Griffin or Bulgasari need to be sucessful today. The details aren't important. Be a friend to the family, and they'll be a friend back.

– "Kid", Morgan Family Associate
ST_Quests.Daily_Freecon_DealDamagePursuerRaven_Des:
The Pilots Union needs combat data for our new "fight or flight" training course. Pursuer pilots, share your flanking expertise. Raven pilots, share your assault tactics. Help new pilots learn the ropes. We're paying credits for your time.

– Ava, Pilots Union Steward
ST_Quests.Daily_Freecon_DealHullDamageGozerNoricum:
The Pilots' Union is collaborating with weapon suppliers to find the best solutions during the disruptions on Terminus. We need your input on Electro weapons (sustainable, locally sourced) vs Blast weapons (Powerful, but reliant on imports from Mars) Your choice shapes the future of our arsenal.

– Ava, Pilots Union Steward
ST_Quests.Daily_Freecon_DealDamageKineticGuns_Desc:
The Pilots' Union is here to do more than manage battle contracts with Dominions. We're here to help you thrive as a mercenary. Complete our kinetic weapons training module to gain valuable experience and bonus pay.

– Ava, Pilots Union Steward
ST_Quests.Quest_Description_Weekly22: The average robot pilot isn't a genius. But would you really want a genius piloting war robots? They might realize there's better money in farming.
ST_Quests.Quest_Description_Weekly5:
This week, Mayflower celebrates the defeat of EvoLife and its human mutation program on Mars. To honor this victory, we’re offering a bonus program to all pilots. Support Mayflower jobs in the Wild Ten and help us celebrate the preservation of humanity—both past and future.

– Department of Peace, Mayflower
ST_Quests.Daily_Mayflower_KillAssistLancelotPurifi:
The network cards on some of our gear modules are acting up. Nothing major, but better safe than sorry, right? If you’re taking Lancelot or Purifier out on the job today, keep an eye out for any issues. Let me know if anything feels off during a firefight, and I’ll send some credits your way.

– Steve Nolan, Mechanic
ST_Quests.Daily_Mayflower_DestroyRobotsIncinerator:
The troubles on Terminus are reshaping my business. I’ve got a stack of Gemini rocket launchers, but rockets are getting harder to come by. I could trade them for more sustainable Incinerators, but will pilots buy them? As they say, the customer is always right. Vote with your trigger and I'll throw you a few credits.

– Bill Rhodes, Weapon Importer
ST_Quests.Quest_Description_Weekly7: There's no test or qualification to become a mercenary pilot. Lots of knuckleheads out here. Only associate with the winners.
ST_Quests.Quest_Description_Weekly11: There's pilots I've met where I knew right away they had something special. And there were others I met and knew they'd be dead in three weeks. Choose your friends wisely.
ST_Quests.Quest_Description_Weekly2: Warp syndrome is a condition of mental deterioration caused by the long-term use of Warp Gates. The Institute of Advanced Warp Study is searching for pilots for study during combat situations. Successful candidates must display delusions of grandeur or melancholy.
ST_Quests.Daily_Freecon_DealHullDamageDragoonShock:
There’s been chatter on Tortuga about our efforts to bring back classic weapon designs. Some remain unchanged, while others get updates. We’re offering pilots the chance to test two options today: the original Shocktrain and a modified variant of the Dragoon. Share your feedback, and we’ll reward you for your insights.


– "Magnum" Jones, Freecon Weapons Importer
ST_Quests.Daily_Freecon_WinBattlesFreeconGuns_Desc:
The Pilots' Union is here to do more than manage battle contracts with Dominions. We're here to help you thrive as a mercenary. Complete our kinetic weapons training module to gain valuable experience and bonus pay.

– Ava, Pilots Union Steward
ST_Quests.Daily_Freecon_DealHullDamage_Description:
Today, the Pilots' Union honors the heroic battle against the Grey Swarm during the Walking Wars. We urge all pilots to fight in memory of Nessa Riggs, Hugo Booker, and the countless brave souls who stood against the A.I. Scourge. For transparency, I must clarify—I am not one of them. Yes, I was there. Yes, I am an android. It’s complicated.

– APPM-3TR, Battle Coordinator
ST_Quests.Tutorial_Level9_Titan_UpgradeModule_Goal: Upgrade any Titan module to level 2
ST_Quests.Tutorial_Level8_Titan_UpgradeWeapon_Goal: Upgrade any Titan weapon to level 2
ST_Quests.Tutorial_Level3_Workshop_Upgrade_Goal: Upgrade any module to level {Criteria} in the Workshop
ST_Quests.Tutorial_Level5_Workshop_Upgrade_Goal: Upgrade module to level {Criteria} in Workshop
ST_Quests.Daily_Freecon_DealHullDamageFreeconGuns_: Use Freecon guns to deal {Limit} armor damage
ST_Quests.Daily_FortEvo_ObtainHonor_Description:
We are mercenaries hired to fight for Dominions who cannot fight each other, but this doesn't mean the work can't be meaningful. During the Walking Wars, Pilots fought for more than just credits, they fought for honor. I encourage pilots to fight from something more than a paycheck.

– Anonymous
ST_Quests.Daily_Freecon_DealDamageEnergyGuns_Descr:
We know the troubles on Terminus are stretching our ammo stocks thin, but contracts must be completed. The Pilots Union is asking all mercenaries to switch to more sustainable energy weapons to help. Do your part and stay safe out there.

– Ava, Pilots Union Steward
ST_Quests.Daily_FortEvo_ObtainHonorFortEvoRobots_D:
We will never stop chasing our dream. We will never stand down. There is always a way forward as long as I am still standing. By fighting with FortEvo, we can change the equation and turn uncertainty into high probability. Fight. Make an Impact. And show our rivals the power of progress.

– Overseer After, FortEvo
ST_Quests.Daily_Mayflower_KillAssist_Description:
We're filming a Wild Ten moive and need pilots to shoot robot combat scenes. Our camera is automated, so you can either hang back and assist or jump into the action yourself—it's your choice. No experience is necessary, but professionalism is a must. Contact us today to learn more!

– Mavis Mork, Talent Scout
ST_Quests.Daily_Mayflower_DestroyRobotsOrkanZeus_D:
We’ve heard complaints about Orkan and Zeus being sold under the Mayflower brand. Here’s the truth: these designs were acquired from Yan-Di and Icarus over a century ago. These weapons are now—and will always be—Mayflower. Show your support by using Orkan and Zeus in combat today.

– Department of Peace, Mayflower
ST_Quests.Daily_Freecon_DealDamageBlastGuns_Descri:
While everyone's worried about the Terminus mess, I see dollar signs. Blast ammo's gettin' scarce? Let's make it even scarcer.  Here's the job. Use up as much blast ammo as you can get your hands on. Drive up the price, and I'll give you a piece of my profits.

– "Dax", Morgan Family Associate
ST_Quests.Daily_Freecon_DealHullDamageTitan_Descri: Why can't a pilot can't use Titans from the start of battle? No one will talk to me about it, but a few credits might help. Next time you fight in a Titan, maybe you can show me what happens in the cockpit? I promise I won't tell anyone.
ST_Quests.Quest_Goal_Weekly21: Win {Limit} battles using Duncan or Kate
ST_Quests.Quest_Goal_Weekly24: Win {Limit} battles using FortEvo torso or weapon
ST_Quests.Quest_Goal_Weekly23: Win {Limit} battles using Freecon torso or weapon
ST_Quests.Quest_Goal_Weekly22: Win {Limit} battles using Ever or Marcus
ST_Quests.Quest_Goal_Weekly25: Win {Limit} battles using Mayflower torso or weapon
ST_Quests.Tutorial_Level2_Combat_WinBattles_Goal: Win {Limit} battle(s) on any Wild Ten site
ST_Quests.Tutorial_Level4_Combat_WinBattlesGoal: Win {Limit} Battles on any Wild Ten sites
ST_Quests.Daily_Freecon_DealDamage_Description:
With Terminus becoming a hot site, supply lines are getting tight. But the fight doesn't stop. We need ammunition, and I'm making it right here on Tortuga. I'm looking for pilots to test my locally made ammo. Prove its effectiveness in the field, and I'll make it worthwhile.

– Anonymous
ST_Quests.Daily_Mayflower_KillAssistTrebuchetShred:
With Terminus disrupting shipments, ammo’s about to get scarce—I can feel it coming. I’ve already stocked up on electro weapons, but now I need you to help tip the scales. The more lead left on the battlefield, the faster we deplete supplies and the bigger the payout. This isn’t about glory—it’s about credits. Hang back, let others take the kill, and let’s watch the profits roll in.

– Anonymous
ST_Quests.Daily_FortEvo_CaptureBeaconsFortEvoRobot:
With the ongoing dispute over Terminus, we’re researching alternative warp transit technologies and need your help. We’re offering extra credits to pilots willing to share data from gate capture events. However, due to recent data leaks, security require using FortEvo torsos for this job.

– Far, FortEvo Scientist
ST_Quests.Daily_Mayflower_DestroyRobotsTrebuchetSh:
With the port of Terminus closed, some of us have been building weapons using old corporate schematics. Now, it’s time to test them. Take down Robots with these rebuilds, and see if they hold up in battle. We’ll settle up when the job’s done.

– Steve Nolan, Mechanic
ST_Quests.Daily_Freecon_DealDamageDragoonShocktrai:
With the supply issues caused by Terminus, we must make the best of what we have. I've built a Dragoon and Shocktrain from spare parts, but something's off, that's where you come in. Take these weapons into battle and tell The Lace how to make them right. Remember, a favor for me is worth more than just my thanks.

– "The Lace", Master Mechanic
ST_Quests.Daily_Mayflower_DestroyRobotsAresFury_De:
You pilots are neutral, right? My crew here on Fissure have a bet. Some say Ares is the best robot. Others say it's Fury. Here's the deal. We'll pay you to take either of these robots for a spin and tell us which machine is better. It's easy money if you have the chops.

– Riley Kim, Fissure Miner
ST_Quests.Daily_Freecon_DealHullDamagePhantomRavan:
Your Pilots Union isn't just here to manage battle contracts—we’re here to help you grow as a pilot through our training program. Today’s training course include Flanker maneuvers with Phantom and defensive tactics using Ravana. As always, participation is rewarded.

– Ava, Pilots Union Steward
ST_Quests.Tutorial_Level11_RobotBuilds_Lancelot_De:
You've got to face the fear in combat to overcome it. Think of when you have no shields and the shells are clanging off the hull just inches outside your command pod. That sound as armor melts, it's a funny kind of music, and some of our veterans never stop "singing" afterwards. Best way to not end up like that is early exposure. Get out there in a Lancelot and tank the flak until I say otherwise. Trust me, you're investing in your future.

-- The Lace, master mechanic.
ST_Quests.Tutorial_Level15_RobotBuilds_Fury_Descri:
Fury was built for sustained combat: Its core gear is to support putting down heavy firepower briefly by warping ammo straight into its weapons. I find Mayflower's technical conservatism curious, but they somehow get more out simple machines than my data would suggest is possible

-- APP-M3TR
ST_Quests.Tutorial_Level1_Combat_PlayBattles_Descr:
Welcome to your new life as a mercenary pilot in the Wild Ten. I’m Ava, your Pilots Union rep here at the Tortuga spaceport—your new home. The Union handles all the battle contracts between you and the Dominions. The only rule? You take jobs without knowing who you're fighting for. That’s how we maintain trust with all the Dominions who hire us. Get settled in, and when you're ready, start earning.

– Ava, Pilots Union Steward
ST_Quests.Tutorial_Level2_Combat_WinBattles_Descri:
In the Wild Ten, being a mercenary is just another job. Win or lose, you’ll get paid for putting your neck on the line. But if you want the big credits, securing contested sites for your employer will earn you hefty bonuses. So, here’s some advice: Don’t just fight—fight to win.

– Ava, Pilots Union Steward
ST_Quests.Tutorial_Level3_Combat_PlayBattles_Descr:
The Dominions are battling for control of the Wild Ten, but they won’t fight each other directly. That’s where you come in. When one Dominion claims a site, another challenges it, and they both hire mercenaries to fight for there claim. It’s a cycle that keeps us busy. As long as we stay neutral, the credits will keep rolling in.


– Ava, Pilots Union Steward
ST_Quests.Tutorial_Level3_RobotRoles_Assault1_Desc:
Every new pilot gets a robot from the Pilots Union to help get started—pretty nice, right? The robot you're using is a Bulgasari, an Assault-class machine built for direct, stand-up fights. Classes help pilots find the robot that fits their combat style, and that's the key to making it as a mercenary out here. So, get out there and start making Salvage. I’ll check in with you later.

– Ava, Pilots Union Steward
ST_Quests.Tutorial_Level3_Workshop_Upgrade_Descrip:
Hello, pilot. The Lace here, master mechanic on Tortuga. Finding fresh parts out on the galaxy's edge isn’t easy, but sitting idle isn’t our way. All pilots collect salvaged parts and use them to upgrade their robots in the workshop. Some might call it a chore, but for most of us, it’s part of the fun. Give it a try. you might enjoy it even more than the fighting.

– The Lace, Master Mechanic
ST_Quests.Tutorial_Level4_Combat_WinBattlesDescrip:
Listen, pilots on Tortuga are a tight-knit community—we look out for each other. But when it comes to making credits, it’s a different story. If making bank means that turning your friends robots into salvage, then no hard feelings. It’s just how things work. So gear up, hit the sites, and win.

– Ava, Pilots Union Steward
ST_Quests.Tutorial_Level4_RobotRoles_Assault2_Desc:
Being a successful pilot is all about finding the a robot that suits your style. Take your Bulgasari, for example. It’s an Assault-class robot that's built like a tank and perfect for frontal attacks. Figuring out what works best for you may take some trial and error, but I’m sure you’ll get the hang of it. Now, get out there, soak up some damage, and make those credits.

– Ava, Pilots Union Steward
ST_Quests.Tutorial_Level4_RobotRoles_Defender1_Des:
Hey Pilot, something just came in for you, courtesy of our friends at FortEvo. It’s a Bulwark Defender-class robot, equipped with some fancy core gear that warps incoming projectiles into it's magazines. It’s a great trick if you’re looking to hold a position. Now that you’ve tried tanking out front, let’s see if standing your ground suits your better.

– Ava, Pilots Union Steward
ST_Quests.Tutorial_Level4_Workshop_BuildARobotDesc:
Good pilots know how to fight with robots, but great pilots know how to build them. The Wild Ten offers plenty of opportunities, but only for those willing to get their hands dirty. Out here, building a robot isn’t just a skill—it’s the only way to be successful. I’ll point you to the Workshop, but the rest is up to you.

– The Lace, Master Mechanic
ST_Quests.Tutorial_Level5_RobotBuilds_Ares_Descrip:
OK pilot, you're "union" now, so I'll let you have the good stuff. Ares is flanker-class, so you gotta learn the method: Use your Wrath for extra firepower and protection, hit from the sides, do some damage, flashbang your target or holofield your way out while your shields recharge, rinse and repeat. I know you can do it, so go make me proud out there.
 
-- Ava, Pilots' Union steward
ST_Quests.Tutorial_Level5_RobotRoles_Defender2_Des:
You’ve probably noticed that Defender-class robots like Bulwark have strong armor. They sure can take a beating. But the trade-off is always weaker shields. So, If you enjoy being a bullet sponge for your team, a Defender might be the right fit for you. Give the Bulwark another try and see how it fits your combat style.

– Ava, Pilots Union Steward
ST_Quests.Tutorial_Level5_RobotRoles_Tactician1_De:
It looks like you've caught the eye of our local FortEvo rep. They’ve asked me to send you a Harpy Torso. It’s a Tactician-class module, which means it's light, fast, and has enough fuel to reach places most pilots only dream of. Plus, it’s equipped with an impressive rocket launcher that can rain down fire on unsuspecting enemies. Sounds like you? Give it a try.

– Ava, Pilots Union Steward
ST_Quests.Tutorial_Level5_Workshop_Upgrade_Descrip:
Modding, hacking, and upgrading are part of everyday life in Tortuga. As a pilot and mechanic, it’s up to you to ensure your robot has the edge in battle. Head to the workshop and tinker with your modules—fine-tuning them could mean victory and defeat on your next contract. If you need a hand, reach out. I’ll be happy to show you a trick or two.

– The Lace, Master Mechanic
ST_Quests.Tutorial_Level6_RobotRoles_Flanker1_Desc:
So you've tried Defender, Assault, and Tactician-class robots—any favorites yet? If none quite match your style, I've got something different for you. Flankers are fast, agile, and designed for hit-and-run tactics. Craft a Phantom Torso and put your skills to the test with some stealth kills. Don't worry, I’ll make sure you’ve got everything you need to build one.

– Ava, Pilots Union Steward
ST_Quests.Tutorial_Level6_RobotRoles_Tactician2_De:
Hey Pilot, I forgot to mention something about the Harpy you’ve been using. Tacticians are not just about mobility—They're also great at providing fire support for your team. Keep that in mind if you’re looking to change up your strategy. Let me know how it goes.

– Ava, Pilots Union Steward
ST_Quests.Tutorial_Level6_Titan_Unlock_Description:
Greetings! Ava tells me you are making excellent progress. Bravo! Are you ready to try a more powerful machine? When standard robots aren’t enough, Pilots rely on Titans. These colossal machines are built for the toughest challenges—stronger, larger, and deadlier than anything else on the battlefield. Only seasoned Pilots can operate them, so consider this the next milestone in your career.

– APPM-3TR, Combat Coordinator
ST_Quests.Tutorial_Level6_Workshop_Crafting_Descri:
In the Wild Ten, even scrap has value. Salvage is a prized commodity, traded like credits and essential for pilots in the Workshop. Once you’ve collected enough, bring it to the nearest Workshop to craft new modules for your robots. Just a heads-up—you’ll need blueprints to get started. Acquiring them can be risky, but the rewards are worth it.

– The Lace, Master Mechanic
ST_Quests.Tutorial_Level7_RobotRoles_Chimera1_Desc:
On Tortuga, not every robot fits neatly into a class. Pilots often mix and match parts to create designs that suit their unique style. We call these hybrids Mixed-Class because they break away from standard battlefield roles. I’ve sent you all the parts you’ll need to build my favorite mixed robot called Griffin. Good luck, and remember—on the frontier, there are no rules.

– The Lace, Master Mechanic
ST_Quests.Tutorial_Level7_RobotRoles_Flanker2_Desc:
Across the Wild Ten, we rely on Warp Gates to transport people and materials to and from Tortuga. But when a site is contested, these gates become critical to securing your employer’s claim. That’s where a Flanker-class robot shines. With speed and agility, they’re perfect for capturing objectives. Take your Phantom out there and start claiming those Warp Gates. Your employer is counting on you.

– APPM-3TR, Combat Coordinator
ST_Quests.Tutorial_Level7_Titan_UseAbilities_Descr:
Titans have the power to change the outcome of any contract—every pilot knows this. But their strength isn’t just about size. It’s the Core gear that truly sets them apart. These machines are built for the toughest challenges, and their abilities are more than enough for any skilled pilot. But don’t just take my word for it, try it yourself.

– The Lace, Master Mechanic
ST_Quests.Tutorial_Level8_Titan_UpgradeWeapon_Desc:
Did you know Titans were first built for the Walking Wars 200 years ago? While this does limit the variety of weapons available, don’t let that discourage you. We can keep upgrading them. Gather some salvage, head to the Workshop, and see how ingenuity defines life on the Frontier.

– The Lace, Master Mechanic
ST_Quests.Tutorial_Level9_Titan_UpgradeModule_Desc:
As a mechanic, there’s nothing that brings me more joy than upgrading Titans. They’re beautiful machines. While they can be challenging to work on, each upgrade I complete help me to learn more about them. Maybe one day, I'll design and build one right here on Tortuga. I know, it’s just a dream for now, but I wanted to share it with you, my friend.

– The Lace, Master Mechanic
ST_Quests.Daily_Freecon_DealDamageNTimes_Descripti:
[SPONSORED] Do you have what it takes to follow in the footsteps of legendary pilots like Kyle Rogers and Linda Cano? The Ministry of Information is seeking ace pilots for our Hero pilot program. Fight for more than credits. Fight to be a legend.

– Freecon, Ministry of Defense
ST_Quests.Daily_Freecon_DealHullDamageFreeconRobot:
[SPONSORED] Freecon celebrates our talented engineers! These heroes transform scrap metal into powerful robots, a testament to Freecon ingenuity. Today only, fight with any Freecon torso and collect bonus pay.

– Freecon, Ministry of Defense
ST_Quests.Daily_Freecon_DealHullDamageFreeconGuns_:
[SPONSORED] I'm sure you've heard rumors about your combat data being leaked. Rest assured, your weapon telemetry is secure with Freecon. If you switched off your data transponder, please turn it back on. Combat data helps us support mercenaries with better weapons and gear. 

Earn bonus credits for transmitting today!
ST_Quests.Daily_Freecon_DealHullDamageTyrFenrir_De:
[SPONSORED] It’s a fact. Tyr and Fenrir were originally designed and built by Evolife over 200 years ago for the Walking Wars. However, the copyright did not transfer to Evolife’s successor, FortEvo. Freecon proudly holds the rights to these legendary designs and will continue producing them for the brave mercenaries who fight on our behalf.

– Freecon, Ministry of Defense
ST_Quests.Daily_Mayflower_KillAssistMayflowerRobot:
[SPONSORED] Mayflower Robots are engineered to win fights, not steal spotlights. When we design our robots, we think about how working together makes lasting success. Victory isn’t just about wins. It’s about unity. We are Mayflower, and we win together.

– Department of Peace, Mayflower
ST_Quests.Daily_Mayflower_DestroyRobotsMayflowerGu:
[SPONSORED] Mayflower robots aren't some alien technology you don't understand or a complicated module you can't control. Our wepaons are built by humans for humans. Today only, we're offering all pilots who use our weapons in battle a chance to win bonus pay.

– Mayflower Department of Peace
ST_Quests.Daily_Freecon_DealDamageFreeconGuns_Desc:
[SPONSORED] This station was taken by CRIMINALS who now call it the "Free State of Tortuga". This injustice cannot stand! Freecon must reclaim what is rightfully ours. Every purchase of Freecon hardware directly supports the fight to take back what was stolen from us.

– Meritus Front
ST_Quests.Daily_FortEvo_ObtainHonorFortEvoGuns_Des:
[SPONSORED] Tired of your limitations? Look no further than FortEvo, the leading innovator in human augmentation. Our technology seamlessly merges robotic with organic systems, giving you an edge in combat. Show the world your potential. Make an impact using ForEvo weapons.

– FortEvo, Conclave of Progress
ST_Quests.Daily_Freecon_DealDamageFreeconRobots_De:
[SPONSORED] We get it. Pilots are neutral and credits talk. But while you're racking up pay, who's fighting for your future? Freecon is. Using our gear isn't just about superior firepower. It's about ensuring there's a place for pilots like you when the dust settles. Don't just fight for credits. Fight for your future.

– Freecon, Ministry of Defense
ST_Quests.Daily_Freecon_DealHullDamageKineticGuns_:
[SPONSORED] While some think the disputes on Terminus is causing a supply shortages, Freecon knows better. We don’t just believe there’s enough ammo—we guarantee it. Freecon is here to keep you fully stocked and ready for action. When it comes to securing your future as a mercenary in the Wild Ten, we’ve got you covered.

– Freecon, Ministry of Defense

ST_Quests.Daily_Freecon_WinBattlesLokiRaven_Goal: Deal {Limit} damage using any blast weapon

ST_Talent_Description.TAL_desc_Sneaky2: Using any gear reduces incoming damage by {DmgResist} for {Duration}.
ST_Talent_Description.TAL_desc_Ult_Ever: Artillery and sniper weapons have a {Chance} chance to deal {DmgBoost} more damage.
ST_Talent_Description.TAL_desc_Leader3: Assists boost your speed and mobility by {SpeedBoostTal} for {Duration}.
ST_Talent_Description.TAL_desc_Brawler3: Boosts primary and secondary stats of Attack gear by {AbilParamBoost}.
ST_Talent_Description.TAL_desc_Brawler1: Your autocannons and rocket launchers deal {DmgBoost} more damage.
ST_Talent_Description.TAL_desc_Tank1: Autocannons and shotguns deal {DmgBoost} more damage.
ST_Talent_Description.TAL_desc_Madman2: All corrosive and fire effects deal {DmgBoost} more damage and last {DurBoost} longer.
ST_Talent_Description.TAL_desc_Tank3: Boosts primary and secondary stats of Defense gear by {AbilParamBoost}.
ST_Talent_Description.TAL_desc_Handy3: Assists reduce cooldowns of your gear by {CDReduct}.
ST_Talent_Description.TAL_desc_Cautious1: Whenever enemy hits your undamaged module, take {DmgResist} less damage for {Duration}
ST_Talent_Description.TAL_desc_Fortevo2: Using any gear charges up your cycle gear by {UltCharge} points.
ST_Talent_Description.TAL_desc_Ult_Idy: Activating any gear speeds you up by {SpeedBoostTal}.
ST_Talent_Description.TAL_desc_Tortuga3: Every assist or kill grants you extra {TitanCharge} Titan points.
ST_Talent_Description.TAL_desc_Sneaky3: Every kill increases a random parameter of your core gear by {AbilParamBoost}
ST_Talent_Description.TAL_desc_Ult_Kate: After losing shields, reflects {DmgReturn} of damage back at the enemy for {Duration}.
ST_Talent_Description.TAL_desc_FortEvo1: Whenever you lose shields, a random module regenerates {RegenSpeed} armor per second for {Duration}
ST_Talent_Description.TAL_desc_Brawler2: For every {Dmg} total damage you deal, instantly regenerates {ShieldBoost} of shield.
ST_Talent_Description.TAL_desc_Cautious2: If no enemies are within {Dist}, fuel regenerates faster by {FuelRegBoost}
ST_Talent_Description.TAL_desc_Ult_Common2: If any enemy is within {Dist}, you take {ArmorBoost} less damage.
ST_Talent_Description.TAL_desc_Handy2: If you are in the air for over {CastDuration}, deal {DmgBoost} more damage against armor.
ST_Talent_Description.TAL_desc_Tank2: You take {DmgResist} less damage from enemies within {Dist}.
ST_Talent_Description.TAL_desc_Brave2: After your module armor drops below {HPLim}, get {ShieldHP} shield. Can activate once per module.
ST_Talent_Description.TAL_desc_Sneaky1: Hitting an enemy that has not damaged you in the last {SecCastDur} restores {FuelReg} fuel per second for {Duration}.
ST_Talent_Description.TAL_desc_Leader1: If two or more allies are within 100m, boosts all of your gear's primary stats by {AbilParamBoost} for {Duration}.
ST_Talent_Description.TAL_desc_Leader2: If two or more allies are within {Dist}, your weapons deal {DmgBoost} more damage.
ST_Talent_Description.TAL_desc_Ult_Carmen: Damaging an enemy with your gear boosts rate of fire by {FireRateBoost} for {Duration}.
ST_Talent_Description.TAL_desc_Tortuga1: If enemy Robot has more than 6 modules, you deal {DmgBoost} extra weapon damage for every module past the sixth.
ST_Talent_Description.TAL_desc_Ult_Common5: Staying still for {SecCastDur} boosts your weapon damage by {DmgBoost}. Cancels on movement.
ST_Talent_Description.TAL_desc_Ult_Common4: Staying still for {SecCastDur} adds {ShieldHP} to your shields. Cancels on movement.
ST_Talent_Description.TAL_desc_Brave1: Your weapons deal {DmgBoost} more damage against enemies within {Dist}.
ST_Talent_Description.TAL_desc_Tortuga2: If your team has more kills than the enemy, your weapons reload faster by {RldSpeedBoost}
ST_Talent_Description.TAL_desc_Freecon1: Boosts all your gear damage by {AbilParamBoost}.
ST_Talent_Description.TAL_desc_Ult_Duncan: Pushing enemy's module into critical state regenerates {ShieldBoost} of your shield.
ST_Talent_Description.TAL_desc_Madman3: Destroying enemies boosts your blast damage by {DmgBoost} for {Duration}.
ST_Talent_Description.TAL_desc_Brave3: Destroying an enemy refills up to {AmmoPerc} of your ammunition.
ST_Talent_Description.TAL_desc_Cautious3: After destroying a foe from at least {Dist}, your weapons reload {ReloadBoost} faster.
ST_Talent_Description.TAL_desc_Flanker3: Boosts primary and secondary stats of Movement gear by {AbilParamBoost}.
ST_Talent_Description.TAL_desc_Ult_Common3: If any enemy is within {Dist}, increases rate of fire by {FireRateBoost}
ST_Talent_Description.TAL_desc_Mayflower1: Taking damage speeds up your weapon reload by {RldSpeedBoost} every {CD}.
ST_Talent_Description.TAL_desc_Ult_Common1: Using Support gear restores {Armor} armor to all damaged modules.
ST_Talent_Description.TAL_desc_Flanker1: Your shotguns and special weapons deal {DmgBoost} more damage.
ST_Talent_Description.TAL_desc_RSupport1: Artillery and sniper weapons deal {DmgBoost} more damage.
ST_Talent_Description.TAL_desc_Ult_Sora: Your shots have a {Chance} chance to hit all of the target's modules at once.
ST_Talent_Description.TAL_desc_Ult_Marcus: Destroying an enemy within {Dist} restores {Armor} armor to all modules.
ST_Talent_Description.TAL_desc_Handy1: Whenever all your gear is on cooldown, activates a {ShieldHP} shield for {Duration}.
ST_Talent_Description.TAL_desc_Mayflower3: Activating any defensive gear reduces shield cooldown by {ShieldDelay} for {Duration}.
ST_Talent_Description.TAL_desc_Madman1: If any of your modules is missing more than {HP_Cap} of armor, your weapons deal {DmgBoost} more damage.
ST_Talent_Description.TAL_desc_Mayflower2: If any module has less than {HP_Cap} of armor, you take {DmgResist} less damage from all sources.
ST_Talent_Description.TAL_desc_General2: You take {ArmorBoost} less damage from all sources.

ST_VO_Pilot_Books.vo_books_catchphrase_200: Book smart is the only smart that counts
ST_VO_Pilot_Books.vo_books_store_highlight_200: Don't judge a book by it's cover

ST_VO_Pilot_Books.vo_books_killed_taunt_200: I am superior in so many ways
ST_VO_Pilot_Books.vo_books_store_highlight_400: I am the only logical choice
ST_VO_Pilot_Books.vo_books_hangar_opened_200: I come from a legacy of pilots
ST_VO_Pilot_Books.vo_books_store_highlight_100: I hope you can see my potential
ST_VO_Pilot_Books.vo_books_catchphrase_500: I see the patterns others miss
ST_VO_Pilot_Books.vo_books_postmatch_round_lose_200: I will analyze our failings and adjust
ST_VO_Pilot_Books.vo_books_outofcombat_enmy_closetovictory: I will not let them win

ST_VO_Pilot_Books.vo_books_catchphrase_400: You can either listen to me or take your chance with ignorance
ST_VO_Pilot_Books.vo_books_catchphrase_600: You see enemies, trajectories, and weak points; I see a beautiful equation to solve
ST_VO_Pilot_Books.vo_books_killed_taunt_301: You're not getting away so easy
ST_VO_Pilot_Books.vo_books_killed_taunt_300: You're not getting off so easy

Tutorial_tips.TutorialNarrator_cutscene_400: According to Tortuga station policies, all new mercenaries must complete basic training before accepting battle contracts on the Wild Ten.
Tutorial_tips.TutorialNarrator_weapons_300: Activate your scope to hit farther targets.
Tutorial_tips.Tutorial_vid_desc_3: All robots are equipped with a protective shield. Once it is depleted, focus your fire on any of the robot’s modules. Destroy one of them.
Tutorial_tips.WelcomeMatchNarrator_highground_tdm: Attention! Enemy forces are launching a hostile takeover of this power plant. You are contracted to counter their aggression. Eliminate all enemy robots and reclaim the facility.
Tutorial_tips.TutorialNarrator_combat_100: Being a mercenary pilot is all about fighting and taking objectives.
Tutorial_tips.Tutorial_ui_tip_09_tr: Use Dash to navigate though water.
Tutorial_tips.TutorialNarrator_beacon_300: Captured Warp Gates become spawn points during a match.
Tutorial_tips.TutorialNarrator_end_100: Congratulations! You survived the PIT. You are now authorized to be a mercenary on Tortuga.
Tutorial_tips.Tutorial_vid_desc_8: The Crusher is located at the highest point of Fissure. When activated, it destroys all the robots beneath. To activate the Crusher, shoot panels on either side of the device.
Tutorial_tips.Tutorial_ui_tip_10_tr: Activate your Jump Jets to dash forward
Tutorial_tips.Tutorial_ui_tip_02_tr: Deep water can slow you down.
Tutorial_tips.TutorialNarrator_abilities_300: Each robot has an ability built into its chassis. Try it out on the next robot.
Tutorial_tips.TutorialNarrator_titan_200: Earn enough points and you can summon a Titan.
Tutorial_tips.Tutorial_ui_tip_eliminateenemies:
Eliminate enemies.

Tutorial_tips.Tutorial_textrender_tip_15: Full armor receives minimum damage. Try it.
Tutorial_tips.WelcomeMatchNarrator_crashsite_elm: Heads up! A Dominion has hired a team of pilots to seize this station. You're hired to stop them. Eliminate all hostile forces.
Tutorial_tips.Tutorial_vid_desc_2: Hold {input}|switch("{Ability2}","{IA_Ability_2}") to activate your jump jets. Hold {input}|switch("{Forward}","") to fly further. A fuel reserve indicator is on your robot's back and under the reticle.
Tutorial_tips.TutorialNarrator_cutscene_200: I am APPM-3TR. But most people pronounce it "Appmeter".
Tutorial_tips.TutorialNarrator_cutscene_500: I know, a bit of red tape.
Tutorial_tips.TutorialNarrator_cutscene_300: I will assist you during training and combat missions.
Tutorial_tips.Tutorial_vid_desc_7: Capture sites by capturing warp gates, which can be used tactically as spawn points. Holding warp gates gives your team Control points. Reach the Control point target to win, or defeat all enemy robots.
Tutorial_tips.Tutorial_vid_desc_9: In Last Robot Standing, you must destroy all enemy robots before they destroy yours. You start with one spawn point, but additional ones unlock as the match goes on. Use them to deploy closer to the ongoing fights.
Tutorial_tips.Tutorial_vid_desc_10: In Team Deathmatch, you get points for destroying enemy robots and Titans. To win, reach the point limit before the enemy. In this mode, lost robots can be redeployed after a delay. On top of that, you can collect Power Ups to gain massive combat bonuses.
Tutorial_tips.WelcomeMatchNarrator_mont_bcn: It seems ownership of this power plant is in question. Stake your employer's claim by controlling warp gates or routing the enemy.
Tutorial_tips.TutorialNarrator_destruct_100: Keep in mind you are piloting a massive war machine.
Tutorial_tips.TutorialNarrator_shields_100: Let's have some fun, shall we?
Tutorial_tips.TutorialNarrator_mercs_200: Mercenaries are loyal to ourselves, not the dominions. Choosing a side in this war would turn our employers into our enemies, and that's not good for business.
Tutorial_tips.TutorialNarrator_destruct_200: Most things on the battlefield are not as sturdy as you are.
Tutorial_tips.TutorialNarrator_continue_200: Move forward to the next area.
Tutorial_tips.Tutorial_ui_tip_capturebeacon: Now capture the Warp Gate by standing inside it until it's blue!
Tutorial_tips.Tutorial_textrender_tip_03: Proceed through the gate on your left.
Tutorial_tips.TutorialNarrator_beacon_100: Now, move into the zone to take the Warp Gate.
Tutorial_tips.TutorialNarrator_water_200: Obstacles such as water can slow you down. Use "dash" to power through it.
Tutorial_tips.TutorialNarrator_titan_100: One more thing, Titan points are awarded for performance.
Tutorial_tips.TutorialNarrator_water_300: Or just walk out. No matter. Onwards!
Tutorial_tips.Tutorial_ui_tip_06_tr: Some objects are destroyed by walking through them. Give it a try.
Tutorial_tips.Tutorial_textrender_tip_10: Spawn a Titan and shoot your enemies!
Tutorial_tips.Tutorial_textrender_tip_16: Spawn a Titan and shoot your enemies!
Tutorial_tips.TutorialNarrator_water_100: The Wild Ten got it's name for a reason. You can expect rugged terrain here.
Tutorial_tips.Tutorial_vid_desc_1: The more distant your target, the less damage you inflict. You can see this by the color of ammo indicator below the crosshair: green for effective range, orange for less effective range and red for minimal damage.
Tutorial_tips.Tutorial_ui_tip_08_tr: The circular zone is a Warp Gate. Capturing it to deploy to various site locations.
Tutorial_tips.Tutorial_vid_desc_6: This Titan will unlock later, but let's get a taster! It has an АоЕ Attack {input}|switch("{Ability5}","{IA_Ability_5}") and Homing Missiles {input}|switch("{Ability3}","{IA_Ability_3}"). There will be 2 enemies but don't worry: you are much stronger than before!
Tutorial_tips.TutorialNarrator_jump_200: Use your jump jets to clear the obstacle.
Tutorial_tips.TutorialNarrator_dash_200: Use your jump jets to move faster.
Tutorial_tips.TutorialNarrator_lore_100: War Robots are powerful machines supplied by your Dominion sponsors. Mastering your mech is critical for success on the battlefield.
Tutorial_tips.TutorialNarrator_cutscene_100: Welcome to Pilot Initiation Training, better known as "The Pit".
Tutorial_tips.TutorialNarrator_beacon_200: When captured, it will turn blue.
Tutorial_tips.Tutorial_textrender_tip_14: Concentrate your fire on the most damaged module when the enemy shield is low. Blue is damaged. Red is critical.
Tutorial_tips.TutorialNarrator_mercs_300: You can choose when to fight, but not where or who to fight. A bit of insurance to keep us employed.
Tutorial_tips.Tutorial_vid_desc_5: Your robot is equipped with a Cycle Gear. Press {input}|switch("{Ability5}","{IA_Ability_5}") to activate Infinite Ammo. You can use it to destroy the enemy robot.  You can view ability descriptions with {input}|switch("{HelpScreen}","{IA_HelpScreen}").
Tutorial_tips.Tutorial_vid_desc_4: Your robot has two gear mods equipped: Rocket Barrage {input}|switch("{Ability3}","{IA_Ability_3}") ({input}|switch("","") to confirm the target) and Shield {input}|switch("{Ability4}","{IA_Ability_4}"). Use them to destroy an enemy robot.
Tutorial_tips.Tutorial_textrender_tip_02: Zoom in with your scope to shoot at distant targets

UI_WelcomePopup.HNG_WelcomeShopText: Bundles of robot modules, weapons, and gear are available in the Shop.
UI_WelcomePopup.HNG_WelcomeHangarText: Hangar— the main game hub. Your hangar can hold up to five Robots and one Titan.
UI_WelcomePopup.HNG_WelcomeProgressionText:
Take part in Battles to increase your Profile Level and receive rewards.
Only {NumPlayersLevel} Levels are available for now, but more will come in future updates. Good luck out there!
UI_WelcomePopup.HNG_WelcomeInventoryText:
Robot modules, weapons and Gear can be stored and crafted in your Warehouse.
To craft an item, you need to unlock its Blueprint, and you must have enough Salvage.
UI_WelcomePopup.HNG_WelcomePopupText:
War Robots: Frontiers needs your help!
We’re working hard on improving the game and we are especially grateful for your feedback.
Get to grips with the basics, let us know any issues and we’ll see you in the Wild Ten!

Weapon_description.WPN_desc_Pulsar: Long range autocannon. Fires energy rounds grouped in short bursts.
Weapon_description.WPN_desc_Trident: A heavy mid-range cannon. Launches ballistic rockets with large splash radius.
Weapon_description.WPN_desc_Orkan: Fires a barrage of unguided rockets, each with a small blast radius.
Weapon_description.WPN_desc_Noricum: Salvo artillery system. Bombards a large area around target.
Weapon_description.WPN_desc_Tusk: Light flak cannon. Charge to reduce bullet spread and increase range.
Weapon_description.WPN_desc_Shredder: A fast and reliable autogun for close-range combat.
Weapon_description.WPN_desc_Scourge: Sustains a focused close-range electric beam over a long duration.
Weapon_description.WPN_desc_Punisher: An old reliable rotary cannon. Rains bullets on enemies within medium range.
Weapon_description.WPN_desc_Dragoon: A heavy plasma cannon for fast and precise long-range fire.
Weapon_description.WPN_desc_Vortex: Locks on target in sight and launches a hail of homing missiles.
Weapon_description.WPN_desc_Katzbalger: A short-ranged Titan-class laser for prolonged skirmishes.
Weapon_description.WPN_desc_Incinerator: Heavy flamethrower. Deals extra damage over time with residual heat.
Weapon_description.WPN_desc_Zeus: Mid-range laser cannon. Fires a single charge that shreds shields and armor.
Weapon_description.WPN_desc_Grubber: A medium range Titan autocannon with massive ammo capacity.
Weapon_description.WPN_desc_Callisto: A crude, but effective Titan plasma autocannon for sustained fire at medium range.
Weapon_description.WPN_desc_Bayonet: A mid-range pulse laser. Discharges a three-shot burst, then quickly recharges.
Weapon_description.WPN_desc_Gemini: Two-barrel rocket launcher. Fires heavy rockets in rapid succession.
Weapon_description.WPN_desc_Thunder: Heavy shotgun with a wide pellet spread. Brutal at close range.
Weapon_description.WPN_desc_Fowler: Heavy flak cannon. Charge to reduce spread at range, or fast tap in melee.
Weapon_description.WPN_desc_Hive: A single-shot Titan shotgun with a wide spread.
Weapon_description.WPN_desc_Lighter: Light flamethrower. Fatal up close, but can be avoided at range.
Weapon_description.WPN_desc_Rampant: Light rapid-fire mortar. Deals damage in a wide area.
Weapon_description.WPN_desc_StickyGun: Launches magnetic bombs that stick to target and explode after a brief delay.
Weapon_description.WPN_desc_Shocktrain: Fires a chain lightning that bounces to up to three enemies near the target. Charge to increase damage.
Weapon_description.WPN_desc_Glory: Shoots wide horizontal plasma arcs that damage everything on their way.
Weapon_description.WPN_desc_Quantuum: Fires a single round that splits into a hail of projectiles mid-flight.
Weapon_description.WPN_desc_Railgun: Light sniper cannon. Delivers a single high-impact precision round on target.
Weapon_description.WPN_desc_Locust: Mid-range shotgun loaded with corrosive shells. Deals extra damage over time.
Weapon_description.WPN_desc_Scatter: Generates a sonic pulse that travels through enemies and physical obstacles.
Weapon_description.WPN_desc_Trebuchet: Heavy sniper cannon. Fires a single projectile with pinpoint accuracy.
Weapon_description.WPN_desc_Gozer: Fires a focused laser beam that wears down targets at medium range.
Weapon_description.WPN_desc_Jigsaw: Hurls circular blades that bounce off walls causing massive damage.
